111232221112.content:
Twilight Sparkle woke up in a dark room. As an avid reader she knew that this was not a good sign. Resisting the urge to call out for help she tried to look around herself. All she could really make out was that she appeared to be in a cage. She also noticed that her legs were pushed apart by a diaper.

A diaper?

Twilight took pause at that for a moment, yet was not as worried about it as she could've been. In fact, she very quickly stopped paying attention to it as though it was something she was used to wearing.

At that moment a door opened and in walked Princess Celestia.

"Princess?! What's going on?" Twilight asked, certain that Celestia would get her out of this strange situation. As Celestia walked inside the room, Twilight noticed she was in a giant nursery sized for her.

"Good morning my little pony." Celestia said sweetly, "As to what's going on is simple, you are my foal." Twilight was confused. "I've noticed how stressed you've been as a princess lately and I've missed taking care of you when you were young. So I decided to turn you into a little foal."

Twilight was worried now. She didn't want to be a foal. "Princess Celestia, this is a good practical joke and all, but I think it's time to let me go now."

Celestia merely laughed, "Joke? this isn't a joke. You are now my foal. Unfortunately the spells needed to make you a foal completely take time. Though the first ones have already been placed. First, I had to take this." Twilight froze in horror as Celestia held up a jar containing her cutie mark. "Starlight Glimmer made for such a great trial run after I managed to get her to teach me this spell. Luna got her own foal out of it too! Second was a targeted memory spell. Everything else takes time to activate."

Twilight was more than just worried now, her mentor had gone insane. Twilight was tense all over, yet for some reason the tenseness around her stomach began to vanish.

"In fact that second spell erased every memory you've ever had about potty training. You can't even remember what it feels like to need use a toilet do you?" Twilight froze at her former mentors words as she looked down and noticed what she had just done.

111311.content:
"...Well, I guess I should get changed out of this thing before I get a diaper rash." Twilight thought to herself, casually prodding the wet diaper with a forehoof.

Shortly after such contemplation, Twilight magically unstrapped the diaper tapes, thus freeing her from the dampened undergarment, where she proceeded to ball it up and tossed it into her personal garbage pail. From there, she calmly trotted her way to her closet, using her Unicorn magic to open the closet doors.

In turn, this revealed several large plastic packages, which contained some rather ridiculously large diapers.

Twilight couldn't help but bear a giddy grin upon her equine snout, as she levitated an opened package towards her and pulled out a bombastically bulky diaper, which inflated to it's full size with an audible *FWOOMPH!!* in response to being freed from captivity.

In appearance, the diaper was far too bulky and padded to be the complete opposite of discreet, as it was colored a rich light violet hue and possessed six diaper tapes instead of the usual four. Overall, the diaper held in Twilight's possession was downright massive, as she easily felt the childish excitement and anticipation swell within her.

"*giggle* Well, I know a certain somepony who would love to wear you today." Twilight said, speaking to the bulky undergarment like it was sentient. From there, she cleaned herself off, then powdered her privates, and finally put on the diaper, strapping the six diaper tapes upon her diapered crotch.

Once she stood back up on all four hooves, Twilight soon felt the diaper's bulk in all it's entirety, where it forcibly pushed her hindlegs a decent bit sideways, thus giving herself a waddling gait. In all honesty, this was how Twilight preferred her diapers to be; Thick, Bulky, and Downright Plushy.

Looking back at her reflection, she slowly turned herself around to put her diaper on full display, wiggling her diapered buttocks to and fro in an experimental and cutesy shake.

She couldn't help but giggle with glee at how it felt, as the diaper crinkle loudly while it shook some. However, whilst she was enjoying herself, Twilight soon felt the pangs of hunger, with her stomach growling in protest, where she looked down at her stomach and said, "I guess I better get some breakfast before Moondancer comes to visit."

And with that, she trotted, or rather "waddled", her way down the stairs, as Twilight heard the comically large diaper crinkle audibly with each waddling step she took on the staircase, with the equally bulky front of the diaper briefly bumping into the staircase with each passing step.

Eventually, after a brief delay, Twilight finally made it downstairs, where...

Twilight made some toast, almost giddy at the thought of completely filling the massive diaper covering her backside all at once. Was she going crazy? Was this too much? She couldn't think of anything that would make this dangerous, so she decided she would follow through on this idea she had. This respected student of magic was going to magically speed up - and increase the volume of - her waste, to fill a diaper that was so thick she couldn't walk right.

Twilight felt very full, and took to waddling over to her books to find the ones she'd need for this endeavor. After a few minutes of looking through her books, she found one for metabolizing food incredibly quickly, and she already had known of the one to multiply the amount of something, but needed a refresher on it. While, looking through the books, she thought that maybe she could slightly adjust them to be gradual, and to begin shortly after the spell is cast, so she could focus all her attention on the feeling of wetting and messing the diaper that she highly anticipated.

Twilight decided she would grab some cleaning supplies in case she'd need it, like any responsible student would prepare for a mess while conducting an experiment, and would do it in the bathroom, since it's even more private and easy to clean by design. Then she was off - waddling to the place she stored cleaning supplies, then to the bathroom.

She closed the door, and stood in the middle of the room. It was time for the metabolization spell.
The highly skilled magical pony's horn began to radiate a purple glow, as she started casting the spell. Upon finishing the spell, her horn let out a flash of purple light, as if to vent out whatever kind of energy it needed to when a unicorn needed to cast most spells, or just part of their design so it could show off their abilities.
Twilight stood in the bathroom, waiting for it to take effect, when she could feel a slight tightening in her abdomen. Her belly began to make low growling noises, and slightly ached. She waited eagerly for the moment she could fill this mass of padding secured to her backside, and started to feel her bladder slowly filling, then her butt.

Twilight then started to cast the multiplication spell, as she could feel herself filling up bit by bit, then let go. She felt the urine flow out of her, first a trickle, then quickly sped up, and poop was pushed out rather quickly, startling Twilight a bit. Then the multiplication began to make its work. Pee was rushing out of her almost faster than the diaper could soak up, gently lapping at her, and her mess was already starting to push up against her, if only stopped by the continuing log of waste coming out of Twilight's ass. She could even feel the diaper getting heavier. The flow was unrelenting, and could not be stopped for as long as the multiplication spell was in effect. The diaper may have been big and bulky before, but all this waste was going to make it even bigger by the time it was done. Mess was starting to collect more and more, spreading from the base of her tail to making its way to her front, and piss was flowing strong as ever.

The spell began to slow down, and so did the flow. Then the diaper seemed to be approaching its limit. Twilight, coming back into reality, started to take a look at the diaper to see the last few moments of the filling process, and was surprised to see how much the diaper had swelled up from its original size. It was just a few inches off the floor, and looked like it was about to leak. Twilight tried to hold the rest of it, but it was hard. She could only slow it, but could not stop peeing and pooping entirely. It slowed, then got faster, then slowed, Twilight tried, then it was too late. As the last of the urine was expelled, she continues to poop. The leg holes started to leak, dripping down the sides of the diaper, and down her legs.

Twilight was finally empty, and her diaper dripped a last few drops into the small puddles under her. Twilight marveled at the absolute size of the diaper. It was so close to the ground. Poop was covering nearly her entire buttocks and crotch, pressing up against them. Urine was making the diaper impossibly large and squishy. Twilight...

"I'll go ask Twilight, you girls stay here and keep an eye on the foals, got it?", Sweetie Belle said.

Once she reached Twilight's tree house, she knocked on the door.

"Come in!", Twilight yelled from inside.

Sweetie Belle opened the door to meet Twilight. She was working on her latest research and was surrounded by various stacks of books.

"What do you need Sweetie Belle?", Twilight asked.

"Do you have any spells that could make a pony younger?" Sweetie Belle answered.

"Yeah, sure. Check the top-left shelf." Twilight said, more focused on her research then Sweetie Belle's question.

Sweetie Belle walked over to where Twilight had directed her, and found a book titled "Age Spells: For The Young Mare in You".

Sweetie took down the book and scanned through the chapters. "Aha!", Sweetie Belle said, after finding a spell that would allow the caster to turn themselves (or another pony) back into a foal. "Perfect!" Sweetie Belle exclaimed, and she ran out the door.

"Your welcome!" Twilight said, though Sweetie had already left.

Once back at Sweet Apple Acres, Sweetie Belle returned to her friends. "Hey gals, I found a spell that'll help us!", Sweetie said, turning the book to the specific spell and showing her friends. "There's no time limit on it, so you can only turn the pony back to normal age with the counter spell on the next page", Sweetie Belle read aloud. "Or until the pony ages naturally".

"I dunno, this spell looks kinda hard. Ya sure ya can do this Sweetie?" Applebloom asked.

"Of course! I'm not a foal anymore... no pun intended." Sweetie answered.

As soon as the bowl was placed in front of Rarity, she instinctively tried to raise the spoon with her magic, causing her diaper to inflate further, pushing her crotch against the front of her highchair.

It was a shame it had to eventually end, since they couldn't possibly keep them as foals forever, right?

Once Woona, Celly, and Fluttershy's bowls were all empty, Sweetie Belle and Applebloom moved over to Rarity and Applejack, respectively, while Scootaloo took a wet cloth and began to clean up the other foals. Sweetie Belle levitated the spoon into the puree mush, grabbed a large spoonful, and floated it up just in front of Rarity's face. Rarity turned her head away and shut her mouth with a "hmmph". Sweetie Belle was expecting this, and began to try and coax Rarity into accepting the baby food.

"Open wide Rarity, here comes the Friendship Express!" Sweetie Belle said, as she moved the spoon around in mid-air. Rarity didn't budge. "Aww come on Rarity, you wouldn't want to make your big sister sad, would you?" Sweetie pouted, creating a face that would melt the hearts of many ponies. Rarity, however, remained firm.

At this point, Sweetie Belle started to get annoyed. "Look Rarity, you're eating this baby food. Now, would you like to do it the easy way, or the hard way?" Rarity simply sat there, refusing to let her sister win. Sweetie Belle’s smile turned into a frown. "Fine then. Looks like it's going to have to be the hard way".

Sweetie Belle gently put the full spoon down on the high chair. With a quick flick of her horn, she grabbed Rarity's head firmly with her magic and forced her to look straight at Sweetie Belle. Four magical tendrils then crawled over Rarity's cheeks towards her mouth. One by one, they crawled in between her lips, slowly forcing her mouth wide open. Rarity tried to muffle an outcry, but only "Hhwuaa!" made it past her lips.

"I'm sorry Rarity, but you refused to cooperate." Sweetie Belle said sternly. With Rarity's head held in place, and her mouth wide open, Sweetie once again picked up the full spoon and levitated into Rarity's mouth. Once the puree was deposited on to Rarity’s tongue, the tendrils shut her mouth tightly. "Good. Now swallow my little foal", Sweetie Belle said, quite menacingly. Rarity had no choice but to swallow the disgusting mush that was in her mouth. She felt it sloppily slide down her throat, and began to quietly cry to herself.

"Shh, don't cry Rarity... There's only about ten spoonfuls left…", Sweetie cooed, opening Rarity's mouth again for another helping.

Meanwhile, on the other side of the room, Applebloom was getting ready to feed her own "little" sister. "Now, are ya gonna be ah good foal and eat ya mush, 'er am ah gonna have 'ta force it down like Sweetie Belle?", Applebloom inquired.

"Ah'll eat ya fwood sis, but cwan ah twalk to ya fer a swecond?".

"Well, little foals aren't supposed 'ta talk, but ah guess ah can let it slide just this once", Applebloom teased.

"It's jwust that, dis was s'pposed to be mah spwecial time. Mah one chance of enwoying diapahs tha way ah wike 'em. Then all of a swudden you and yer fwiends show up, awong with fwour other ponies, and now your fworcing us to do tings we dun wanna do!". Applejack said, hoping her sister would understand her discomfort.

"Look Applejack, ah know ya wanted this to be yah special time, but this a'int just about you. We 'ave a chance of getting our babysitt'in cutie marks here, ahnd ah'm not going tah let something like that jus' slip by!" Applebloom declared. "Besides, we're not gonna keep ya like this forever, jus' til the end of the day, alright? Now, stop yapping and start eating!" Applebloom finished, as she shoved the spoon into Applejack's mouth.

Applejack reluctantly swallowed the mush. "Alwight, but can I at weast 'ave mah diapah chwanged?"

"Ya might wanna keep em on fer jus' a bit longer," Applebloom smirked.

Applejack raised her eyebrow at this, just before she felt an overwhelming pressure in her bowels. "Aw no! Not again! Pwease!" Applejack doubled over in her highchair before releasing yet another wet load into her already overflowing diaper. If it wasn't full to the brim yet, it was now. Applejack could feel the manure in her diaper pushing against her from all angles, squeezing her tender areas. It pushed itself into every crack below her waist. Applejack was sure that she had a rash now, and was now begging to her sister to be changed.

Applebloom walked over to her sister, picked her up, and carried her over to the changing table. She was about to open the diaper, when Sweetie Belle noticed what was going on.

"Applebloom, what are you doing?" Sweetie Belle said. Scootaloo, also hearing this, also turned around and glanced at Applebloom.

"Uh, I was just thinkin'... Applejack's had a pretty rough day, perhaps we ought'a give 'er a diaper change?" Applebloom said with a worried smile.

"I don't think so". Sweetie Belle replied. "Applejack is our foal, and she's not getting changed until she's ready".

"But just look at her diaper!" Applebloom exclaimed. "It's practically overflowing!"

"Hmm, you're right. We should fix that." Sweetie Belle grinned, as she lit up her horn with magic. Suddenly, Applejack was lifted up into the air. Magic curled around her diaper, slowly massaging the mess inside. Suddenly, the sides of the diaper began to grow. The lining of the diaper expanded outwards. More frills grew along the length of the diaper. The elastic holes pressed against Applejack's legs and waist tightened, preventing any chance for the waste inside to escape. Applebloom watched with a distressed expression as her sister's diaper grew nearly twice it's size. Applejack simply moaned into her pacifier, waiting for the whole ordeal to end.

Once Sweetie Belle was finished with her spell, she slowly levitated the orange pony down on the floor. "There. Now there's room for more!"

Applejack looked down at the enormous diaper between her legs and whimpered. Sweetie Belle then pulled Applebloom over to the other side of the room to talk. She looked Applebloom in the eye. "Now that that's over with, I never want to see you try and defy me again." Sweeite Belle said sternly. "What are we doing this for again?"

"To get our cutiemarks..." Applebloom glumly replied.

"Right. Now I don't see a cutiemark on either of our flanks, which means we have to keep trying."

"But when if baby sitting ain't our thing?" Applebloom inquired, trying to reason with the other filly.

"Please Applebloom, we've only been at this for a couple hours, you need to give it more time. How does until the end of the day sound?"

"Alright, Ah guess that makes sense", Applebloom said, breaking a small smile.

"That's my girl." Sweetie Belle giggled. "Now that everypony's back in order, what should we do next?"

The doctor stepped out as a nurse stepped in,
"Here you are, Miss Pie." She said between her teeth as she held a diaper in her mouth.

"Ooh, I dunno if I could ever..." Pinkie stopped mid-sentence as her eyes caught the sight of the shiny, poofy diaper. She started to smile.

"WOWEE!" Pinkie jumped in her bed. "It's soooo cute!"

"Cute what?" The nurse asked.

"The diaper! I bet it'll look sooo adorable on me!"

The nurse blinks.
"Oh, well, okay. I'm glad to see you enthusiastic about the situation at least. Now if you just lay down still, I can put you in it."

"Surey!" Pink slid down onto her beg and spread out her back hooves.

"Pinkie Dear!" The voice of Rarity is heard from outside the room as the white mare jogs in. She takes a breath, then opens her eyes.
"I got word you were in an accident! Pinkie, how are you?!?"

"I'm gonna wear a diaper." Pinkie answered, nodding her head with her eyes closed, her nose pointing forward as the nurse powdered her and taped the diaper shut.

Rarity gasped and put her hoof to her mouth.
"Celestia no! Oh dear Pinkie I'm so sorry!" She said, getting closer to her bed, while trying to keep her eyes off the diaper.

"She incurred major damage to her bladder and bowels." The nurse gravely intoned, adjusting the diaper around. "She won't be able to feel when she needs to go, nor will she be able to 'hold it' anymore."

"And is this curable??" Rarity asked.

"There are at least no means to recover from incontinence in the Earth Pony field, that much I know."

"Don't sweat it Rarity!" Pinkie said reaching up and hugging her by the neck. "Diapers are fun!"

She turned around and made a pose on the bed.
"Don't I look completely adorable?" She blinked and paused for a second. "...oh! Not to be self-centerized or glory-ifying or anything!" She said, lowering her head and blushing.

Pinkie and Rarity trotted out the Hospital front door.

"Now dear," Rarity said concerned, "I'm very happy to see you accepting all this so quickly, but you've got to keep it in perspective. We're talking about a life of... well... doing stuff... in your own clothes! It will be dreadfully dirty, and you'll have to be very conscious about what it will look like and... smell... like to everypony around you."

"Wha...," she started, picking up the sheets to examine them. The smell and wetness were apparent, and she yelped and put them down as quickly as she picked it up. She rinsed off her hooves in the sink, carefully trying not to get water all over Rainbow's bathroom.

Rainbow, hearing the confused yelp, rushed into the bathroom, fumbling over her hooves and words at the same time. Bursting open the door, she quickly tried to get out as many words as she could, at a speed that even she didn't know she was capable of.

11422.content:
Rainbow Dash had been busy working high in the skies of Ponyville. Her day had started off with a hectic schedule, giving her no leeway as she had been assigned to make sure that a large downpour of rain happened three days from now. It was going to be a severe storm, but the town had handled far worse.

Dash flew around, pushing clouds together and apart, making sure they would go in the proper direction or release the proper amount of rain. It was tedious, but nothing she couldn't handle. After all, she had saved Equestria more times than she could count.

Dash wiped some sweat off her brow, pushing her rainbow mane out of her purple eyes. She looked around to see the others hard at work, doing the same thing as her. All but one.

Derpy moved a rather black cloud out into the open sky, away from the rest of the clouds. Sometimes she could be such a klutz. Dash groaned in annoyance as she flew from her original spot in the sky to Derpy's location in less than three seconds, putting herself in front of the cross eyed mare.

"Derpy, what do you think you're doing?!" Dash chastised, "The storm clouds are suppose to be that way!"

Derpy's ears drooped as she looked apologetically at the brash mare in front of her. "I'm sorry. I just thought that the east side of Ponyville would need more rain."

Though Derpy was sincere, Dash was already too far into her rant. Dash continued with her rant saying, "I don't know what you were thinking, but you need to stop thinking like that! Follow the plan! Now give me the cloud, I'll fix it."

Derpy was having trouble figuring out her emotions as she just lamely put her head down before saying, "You don't need to do that. I can put it back."

"No, you can't. Now give it here before you really mess something up," Dash said. Though she was generally a lax mare, she was also a winner, sometimes letting her desire to get things done overwhelm her emotions. However, Derpy did not care. She had enough.

Derpy jumped on top of the cloud, staring at Dash with anger. "I don't know why you're being so mean!" Derpy stepped foward, causing the cloud to start making noticeable rumbling, "I am trying, but I just can't do anything right. huh?" Derpy took another step, causing even more rumbling to come from the cloud.

Dash noticed the rumbling. "Derpy, I-" She was stopped mid-sentence by Derpy as she continued.

"If you don't think I can do anything right, then fine!" Derpy jumped off the cloud, sparking coming from the inside of the black form. Derpy then raised her hind legs before saying, "Take your stupid cloud!"

Derpy kicked the cloud and that was all that was needed as the cloud spewed lightning and hit Dash. Dash screamed in pain as she fell to the ground. Derpy and the rest of the crew that had been watching flew down as fast as they could to see if their captain was alright.

Derpy was the first to reach the ground and saw Dash...
11422.title: Bowel

114221.content:
Derpy sighed as Dash got up with some effort, finding the fall to be rather painful as one might assume.

"Are you alright, Dash?" Derpy said with concern. She never met to do that.

Dash stood up to her full height with a wince. "Yeah, I think I'm alright," she said with pain. She glanced over at Derpy, before she sighed. "Derpy, I'm sorry. I'm just stressed is all. This is a really tight deadline and I need this done as fast as possible."

Derpy gave a smile as she responded happily, "Apology accepted."

The two gave each other a quick hug before Dash separated quickly from the embrace with a grin on her face. The team, including Derpy, flew off, but before Dash could get off the ground, she felt her tail hike involuntarily as she slightly squatted.

Dash began to mess herself in the open fields of Ponyville. She hadn't even felt it! Her bowels strained as they pushed out her mess, it fell to the ground in soft lumps, hitting the grass with a squelching sound. Dash blushed furiously at what was happening. Luckily, no one was around to see this, but she swerved her eyes in all directions just to be sure.

Finally, her bowels relaxed as she gave a content sigh, before her blush and reason returned. She spun around and saw the mess she made on the ground and stared at in in trepidation. What should she do?
114221.title: Conscious

1142211.content:
Dash flew away from her shame as fast as she could. She flapped her wings, flying to her humble abode in the clouds. She couldn't handle it.

Her home couldn't have come sooner. She rushed in the moment she saw it, closing the windows and locking her door to be sure that no one disturbed her. She walked into the living room with shock evident on her face. What had happened? She just started messing herself like a foal. Maybe it was the lightning that did this, or maybe the fall. Either way, she knew she needed to find a way to fix this quick.

Dash thought about her options. There weren't many good ones that came to mid. Maybe she could just sit on the toilet until she got better? She crossed that option out. That wasn't a viable solution. Maybe she could just carry around toilet paper so she could throw her messes into the garbage. That too wasn't a viable solution. Besides, she'd look like a doofus and her reputation would be destroyed forever.

In the end, only two viable options came to mind. She could either head to a doctor and get them to fix this or... she could go out and buy diapers. Dash thought long and hard on both of them, not liking either, but seeing no other options. In the end she decided to...
1142211.title: Fly away

11422111.content:
"I can't believe I have to buy diapers," Dash said with disgust. She had wanted a better solution, but she didn't want to tarnish her reputation because she told somepony about her problems. She just couldn't live it down.

Dash flew down to the town square of Ponyville. She never came down here that often unless it was to restock her pantry or to go to Twilight's castle, but today was a special occasion. She flew down to the streets before she folded her wings in and began walking towards on of the town stores that was near the outskirts of the market.

It was a rather shabby old cottage like the rest in Ponyville, but a rustic sign was hung above the door that read Sunny's general goods. The people there were nice enough, they were always happy to have her as a customer in her store, but Dash wasn't concerned about the people, she was concerned about the products. The store had several goods including a section for people with incontinence. It was the only store with that section. Sadly, the section was hardly used, considering that there were very few ponies with incontinence in Ponyville.

Dash walked into the store to see the smiling face of the cashier, Sunny.

"Well good afternoon, miss. Can I help you with anything?" Sunny asked. Dash blushed slightly, but responded with a quick no.

Dash walked to the incontinence aisle, before turning into it and walking down the aisle. There were so many brands of diapers!

The section was littered with diapers of all sizes and colors. Some even had different features like wetness indicators. Dash continued her walk until she reached the diapers that would fit her. They were all of the same basic medical design. All of them seemed generally the same with no difference but the packages. It was hard to tell which one was the better pick.

"I see you found our incontinence section." Dash recoiled away from the voice with a slight yelp. Apparently Sunny had decided to check on her customer and found her staring at all the diaper brands. Sunny smiled as she watched Dash calm herself with a blush.

"Y-yeah..." Dash said nervously, "I was just a bit curious is all."

Sunny looked curiously at Dash. "What about?" she inquired.

Dash, with a blush, decided to answer. Maybe this mare could help her.

"Yeah, I was curious about what diaper would be best for a pony with- uh... bowel problems..." Dash said, the last part being barely above a whisper. Dash looked across the aisle, before eyeing a random package and picking it up, "But I think I found what I was looking for."

Dash put on a fake smile as she held the package with her fore-hoof. Sunny frowned as she looked at the package of diapers in Dash's hoof.

"I don't think you want that brand for bowel problems," Sunny said calmly, "Inconti-mare doesn't really deter odor well, so ponies would really notice the stigma."

Sunny then went to pull out another package of diapers at the bottom of the shelf. "Silly Filly however does a much better job," Sunny said.

Dash looked at the package in her hoof, before she looked at the package in Sunny's.Dash said, "Those diapers seem a lot thicker."

Sunny gave a sheepish smile, before shrugging her shoulders. "It's either the thicker ones or the thinner ones. Your choice."
11422111.title: Buy diapers

114221111.content:
"I- I think I'll take the Silly Filly," Dash said with trepidation. She didn't know if this was the right choice, but she felt that smelling of manure would attract far more attention than having a lumpy diaper.

"Good choice," Sunny said with a smile as she swapped Dash's package of Inconti-mare with the package of Silly Filly.

Dash held the package of diapers with shaking hooves as she and Sunny moved over to the counter. Sunny casually ringed in a few numbers as Dash just stared at the package of Silly Filly diapers, occasionally looking around to see if anyone was looking at her. Luckily, the store was empty as the residents of Ponyville found the outside much more alluring than the confines of the general store.

"That will be ten Bits," Sunny said happily. Dash broke from her trance as she nodded and gave the Bits to Sunny. Sunny bagged the package before hoofing it off to Rainbow Dash.

"Thanks," Sunny said, "By the way, if you want to put on one of those diapers right now, then you can change in the bathroom in the back."

Dash blushed at the statement. She could easily say that it was for someone else and leave the store with the diapers, but what if she messed herself on the way back. Should she take that risk?
114221111.title: Choose Silly Filly

"Nah, these diapers are just for a friend," Dash said with a bead of sweat rolling down her brow. Before Sunny could question the statement, Dash said, "See ya," before flying out the door, leaving Sunny all to her lonesome.

Dash flapped her wings as hard as she could, flying back to her house making sure that no one could see the bag in her hand, let alone what was inside of it. Dash saw her humble abode and rushed inside once again to hide from the prying eyes of everyone. Dash walked to her bedroom before laying the package of diapers down.

Dash looked at the package skeptically, before resigning herself to her fate. She pulled the package out of the bag, before she ripped the package open and pulled out one of the diapers. The diaper itself was rather bulky, having a lot of padding that made it thick. Dash became intrigued by the size of the diapers, but snapped herself out of her stupor.

Rainbow laid the diaper onto the floor of her bedroom, before she laid herself down on top of the diaper. The padding sent a well of feelings tingling up her spine. She couldn't defer what emotions she felt from all the others. She pulled up the front of the diaper, before pulling up the tapes on the sides. She had a bit of difficulty placing the tape properly, but manage to get it on properly.

Dash lifted herself off the ground. Taking solace in this newly found well of feelings. This was different than anything she had ever worn.

Rainbow Dash was pulled from her trance when her mind received several signals, informing her that...

1142211112.content:
Dash couldn't trust her body to hold in a mess. If she were to mess herself in the middle of town, then her reputation would be ruined.

"Thanks," Dash said with a nervous chuckle as she excused herself to the fillies room.

Dash closed and locked the bathroom door, before she walked over to the changing station and laid her package of diapers on top of it. She tore open the package, before she pulled out a diaper and laid beside the package on the changing table. Dash then put the diapers back into the bag, before she laid herself on top of the changing station. She laid her rump onto the soft padding, feeling the fluffy garment hold it like a cushion. The diaper caused a well of feelings to grow inside her, no emotion being prominent in the mass amount of feelings that were in her chest. She pulled the front of the diaper up, before she taped the sides with difficulty, even having to re-tape a few times.

Dash sat up in her new padding. The padding seemed rather thick, making it obvious that she was wearing the diaper. Even if she was to fly above the ponies at top speed, they would still make out her diapered form. Another problem was that the weather team was still working, meaning she couldn't hide in the clouds unless she wanted her teammates to see her in this state. That left only one option which Dash gulped at. She had to sneak through the town back to her house.

Dash slowly walked out of the bathroom, the crinkling of the diaper an ever-present sound that made her blush. Sunny saw Dash pass by with the bag in her muzzle and a diaper wrapped around her flank. Sunny gave a small smile as she saw Dash cautiously leave the store.

Dash walked through the streets and alleys of Ponyville as stealthily as possible. Luckily, there had been very few ponies nearby, however, she knew her luck was about to change. Her abode was on the other side of town, meaning she would have to head near the center where all the ponies are gathered.

Dash continued to encroach closer to the town center until she saw the town square. The sun was beginning to set, leaving very few ponies in the square. Dash saw very few ponies looking her way as well. She saw her chance to get pass the center of the town fast. However, she could always just take the longer route back and not take the risk. What should she do?
1142211112.title: Change

11422111121.content:
Dash decided to take the chance. She rushed through the town square as fast as possible. She was about to make it to the street on the other side when she saw an orange hoof coming around one of the alleys. Dash stopped dead in her tracks as her eyes darted, looking for a place to hide from the oncoming pony.

Dash's eyes landed upon a stall which she jumped to, before crawling beneath it. She steadied her breathing as she pulled the bag in her mouth in closer to her. She heard hoofsteps coming closer to the stall, getting louder and louder by the second. She felt her tail hike.

Dash's eyes widened as her body involuntarily pushed a rather large mess into the diaper. She quietly grunted as her body pushed in the pile of manure, causing the padding to gain a lumpy texture from the mess. She continued to push as more her bowels filled more of the diaper. Finally she sighed quietly.

The clopping of the trots finally reached their zenith as the orange feet came in front of the stall. Dash looked at the feet for a moment before she gave a quick little gasp. She was right under Applejack's stand. Dash's eyes closed as she lowered her head, praying that AJ wouldn't notice. Several minutes later, the orange feet disappeared, becoming more distant as Applejack rolled a cart away from her stall.

Dash stayed under for another minute, before she crawled out from under the stall and quickly rushed out of the center of town with her mess sagging behind her. She flew back to her house in the sky as soon as it was in sight, making sure that nopony saw her diaper.

Dash walked in before placing the bag of diapers on the kitchen counter. She sighed as she lowered her head on the counter. Now that all the stress of hiding was gone, what did she think about these diapers. Were they nice or not?

Finally, she sighed in relief.

Dash blushed a bit as she felt the mess in her diaper sag. It was firm, forming a lumpy bulge in her diaper. She decided that it was best not to pay attention to it.

Rainbow Dash continued to walk down the cobblestone path, seeing no ponies walking by until she turned into an alleyway. A young orange Pegasus rode past Dash at phenomenal speed, before skidding to a stop. Scootaloo looked at her blushing big sister, or more specifically, the messy diaper strapped to her waist.

"Dash, why are you wearing a diaper? Aren't they like for foals?" Scootaloo said, trying to suppress a laugh. Rainbow blushed even more at that statement.

"It's complicated," Dash said shyly. Scootaloo nodded as she rode closer to Dash, before scrunching up her nose and moving back to her original spot.

"Well whatever it is your still cool," Scootaloo said, before continuing, "Just make sure to get a change."

Dash nodded, but before she could walk off Scootaloo called out to her.

"Yeah, kid?" Dash said to Scoots. The orange Pegasus replied with excitement.

"I just came up with the best idea ever,"

Dash raised her eyebrow in confusion. "What is it?" Dash asked.

"I was thinking about what we could do for our crusade tomorrow, but foal sitting wasn't one we've done before. I was wondering, since you're kinda wearing diapers, if you could be the foal?" Scootaloo said. Dash's face turned a solid red as she waved her hooves in front of her chest.

"No way!" Dash yelled, "I'm not a foal!"

"Please?" Scootaloo begged, giving Dash the best puppy dog eyes she could muster.

Dash was considering actually doing it for Scootaloo. Those puppy-dog eyes are really convincing. Should she agree to this or not?

Dash held the package of diapers with shaking hooves as she and Sunny moved over to the counter. Sunny casually ringed in a few numbers as Dash just stared at the package of Inconti-mare diapers, occasionally looking around to see if anyone was looking at her. Luckily, the store was empty as the residents of Ponyville found the outside much more alluring than the confines of the general store.

"That will be ten Bits," Sunny said happily. Dash broke from her trance as she nodded and gave the Bits to Sunny. Sunny bagged the package before hoofing it off to Rainbow Dash.

"Thanks," Sunny said, "By the way, if you want to put on one of those diapers right now, then you can change in the bathroom in the back."

Dash blushed at the statement. She could easily say that it was for someone else and leave the store with the diapers, but what if she messed herself on the way back. Should she take that risk?
114221112.title: Choose Inconti-mare

1142211121.content:
"Nah, these diapers are just for a friend," Dash said with a bead of sweat rolling down her brow. Before Sunny could question the statement, Dash said, "See ya," before flying out the door, leaving Sunny all to her lonesome.

Dash flapped her wings as hard as she could, flying back to her house making sure that no one could see the bag in her hand, let alone what was inside of it. Dash saw her humble abode and rushed inside once again to hide from the prying eyes of everyone. Dash walked to her bedroom before laying the package of diapers down.

Dash looked at the package skeptically, before resigning herself to her fate. She pulled the package out of the bag, before she ripped the package open and pulled out one of the diapers. The diaper itself was rather bulky, having a lot of padding that made it thick. Dash became intrigued by the size of the diapers, but snapped herself out of her stupor.

Rainbow laid the diaper onto the floor of her bedroom, before she laid herself down on top of the diaper. The padding sent a well of feelings tingling up her spine. She couldn't defer what emotions she felt from all the others. She pulled up the front of the diaper, before pulling up the tapes on the sides. She had a bit of difficulty placing the tape properly, but manage to get it on properly.

Dash lifted herself off the ground. Taking solace in this newly found well of feelings. This was different than anything she had ever worn.

Rainbow Dash was pulled from her trance when her mind received several signals, informing her that...
1142211121.title: Leave store

1142211122.content:
Dash couldn't trust her body to hold in a mess. If she were to mess herself in the middle of town, then her reputation would be ruined.

"Thanks," Dash said with a nervous chuckle as she excused herself to the fillies room.

Dash closed and locked the bathroom door, before she walked over to the changing station and laid her package of diapers on top of it. She tore open the package, before she pulled out a diaper and laid beside the package on the changing table. Dash then put the diapers back into the bag, before she laid herself on top of the changing station. She laid her rump onto the soft padding, feeling the fluffy garment hold it like a cushion. The diaper caused a well of feelings to grow inside her, no emotion being prominent in the mass amount of feelings that were in her chest. She pulled the front of the diaper up, before she taped the sides with difficulty, even having to re-tape a few times.

Dash sat up in her new padding. The padding seemed rather thin, making it hard to tell that she was wearing the diaper if she had some sort of clothing on, but she didn't. Ponies would notice the garment, even if she was to fly above the ponies at top speed, they would still make out her diapered form. Another problem was that the weather team was still working, meaning she couldn't hide in the clouds unless she wanted her teammates to see her in this state. That left only one option which Dash gulped at. She had to sneak through the town back to her house.

Dash slowly walked out of the bathroom, the crinkling of the diaper an ever-present sound that made her blush. Sunny saw Dash pass by with the bag in her muzzle and a diaper wrapped around her flank. Sunny gave a small smile as she saw Dash cautiously leave the store.

Dash walked through the streets and alleys of Ponyville as stealthily as possible. Luckily, there had been very few ponies nearby, however, she knew her luck was about to change. Her abode was on the other side of town, meaning she would have to head near the center where all the ponies are gathered.

Dash continued to encroach closer to the town center until she saw the town square. The sun was beginning to set, leaving very few ponies in the square. Dash saw very few ponies looking her way as well. She saw her chance to get pass the center of the town fast. However, she could always just take the longer route back and not take the risk. What should she do?
1142211122.title: Change

11422111221.content:
Dash decided to take the chance. She rushed through the town square as fast as possible. She was about to make it to the street on the other side when she saw an orange hoof coming around one of the alleys. Dash stopped dead in her tracks as her eyes darted, looking for a place to hide from the oncoming pony.

Dash's eyes landed upon a stall which she jumped to, before crawling beneath it. She steadied her breathing as she pulled the bag in her mouth in closer to her. She heard hoofsteps coming closer to the stall, getting louder and louder by the second. She felt her tail hike.

Dash's eyes widened as her body involuntarily pushed a rather large mess into the diaper. She quietly grunted as her body pushed in the pile of manure, causing the padding to gain a lumpy texture from the mess. She continued to push as more her bowels filled more of the diaper. Finally she sighed quietly.

The clopping of the trots finally reached their zenith as the orange feet came in front of the stall. Dash looked at the feet for a moment before she gave a quick little gasp. She was right under Applejack's stand. Dash's eyes closed as she lowered her head, praying that AJ wouldn't notice.

"Phew wee! What in tarnations is that smell?!" Applejack said as she waved her hoof in front of her muzzle. Dash cringed at AJ's words. Why hadn't she taken the thicker ones?

Applejack sniffed the air for a minute, trying to find the source of the stench. Her nose led her down below her stall to find a petrified Dash wearing a messy diaper.

"Dash? What're ya doin' wearin' a diaper?" Applejack asked, surprised by the diaper wrapped around her friends waist.

Dash stayed under the stall. "Promise me you won't laugh about this?" Dash said timidly. Applejack stared confused for a moment, before she gave a nod.

Dash stepped out from under the stall, "Thanks," Dash said with a blush as her messy diaper swayed under her. "This morning I figured out I was incontinent."

Applejack had a dumbfounded expression. For Rainbow Dash, the daredevil Wonderbolt, to wear diapers was unbelievable.

"I... Wow." That was the only response Applejack could come up with for a moment until she regained her composure. "I'm sorry this happened to you. How d'ya figure it out?"

Dash blushed at that. "After I got shocked by lightning, I just... lost control of my bowels."

Applejack gave a curt nod. "Well, I promise I won't tell anypony," she said. Dash wasn't satisfied.

"You'll have to pinkie promise," Dash said. AJ rolled her eyes, but did so anyways.

"Cross my eye, hope to fly, stick a cupcake in my eye," Applejack recited.

Dash sighed as she both parties walked off. Both having to deal with the current events.

Dash finally found her house, before she flew in, taking care to make sure that no one could see her lumpy diaper. Dash walked in before placing the bag of diapers on the kitchen counter. She sighed as she lowered her head on the counter. Now that all the stress of hiding was gone, what did she think about these diapers. Were they nice or not?
11422111221.title: Risk it

114222.content:
Dash groggily opened her eyes. A light shined above her as she raised a fore-hoof to allow her to see. She noticed she was in a rather bland room. A dull white blanket covered her and a gown was put on her. It didn't take her long to deduce where she was, because in her line of work she had plenty of visits.

Yep. she was in the hospital.

Dash didn't mind much. It wasn't the first time a crash had sent her to the Ponyville General hospital, however, she didn't know what she was here for now. She felt fine. Dash laid herself up on the bed which is when she felt something wrapped around her waist and heard crinkling coming from said object. In her curiosity, she uncovered herself only to find something she didn't expect to be there. A massive white diaper.

Well it wasn't as big as Dash thought it was, but in her state she didn't care. Dash's eyes widened as her breaths became more erratic. Panic set into motion.

The sound of the doors lock brought her back to reality as she heard the sound of hooves clopping into the room. Coming through the door was Dr. Horse.

While the name was a rather unoriginal one, he was one of the best doctors in the hospital. He had helped several patients during his time as a doctor and had found himself being an important part of anyone's visit. It was why Dash remembered him so clearly. Brown mane parted to each side for his horn, blue eyes, and a light amber coat along with a cutie mark of a heart monitor.

"Oh, you're awake, Ms. Dash, and I see you found the diaper around your waist," Dr. Horse said with a lighthearted chuckle.

Rainbow Dash was in no mood for his lighthearted banter. "Yeah I found it! Why is it on me!?" Dash demanded.

Dr. Horse sighed. The smile on his muzzle disappeared as he gave a quick but sorrowful answer."I'm sorry to tell you, Ms. Dash, but when Derpy struck you with lightning, she caused the nerves in your bowels to fry and become useless. I'm sorry, but your incontinent," Dr. Horse said. He saw Dash realize what those words meant. Her magenta eyes were unbelieving. "I'm sorry."

Dash couldn't comprehend it. At first she felt like she was the queen of the world, but now...
114222.title: Unconscious

1142222.content:
Before Dash could reply to the doctor, she felt her bowels push out a heavy mess into her diaper. She grunted in strain as she pushed in pile after pile of manure. Doctor Horse decided to avert his gaze as she finished pushing her mess into her diaper. He was notified that she was done when she panted in relief.

"Ms. Dash, do you require any assistance?" Doctor Horse asked.

Rainbow Dash did not reply. She was too deep in thought. She had a hard time believing her situation, but now that she had messed herself, she couldn't deny it. She was stuck in diapers. Like a foal. Forever. Those thoughts scared her, but one thought pushed through them all. What will everyone think?

As if to answer her worst nightmare, the door opened once again and in came all of her friends. First Twilight, then Fluttershy, after her Rarity, followed by Applejack, and finally Pinkie Pie. All of her friends had brought gifts and laid them beside the bed. They quickly noticed the mess in her diaper and the expression of terror on her face and decided to back away. Doctor Horse saw the tension in the room and decided to leave without another word.

"I-I." Dash couldn't form any words. She began to tremble as she looked away. "D-Don't look at m-me. You probably think I'm pathetic now don't you?" Dash asked. She didn't know what they would say. The most horrible thought came to mind that she dared not to dwell on. However, something unexpected happened.

All of her friends gathered around her and brought her into a tight embrace. "Oh, Dash," Twilight spoke, "Why would you think so little of us?"

"Yeah, Dashie! We're your friends," Pinkie said.

"And no matter what, darling..." Rarity began.

"We're always here for you," Fluttershy finished. All of her friends nodded in agreement as Dash looked on in amazement. She was happy to have friends like this.

"Now, sugarcube, since yer' eh-... predicament is rather difficult, we all agreed that we would be more than willing to allow ya ta' spend yer' days out of the hospital with us," Applejack said. Rainbow was a bit confused by the offer.

Pinkie jumped into the conversation. "Do you wanna go to our houses so we can help you with your diaper problem or what?"

Dash awed in understanding. Pinkie always made things easy to understand. It was a nice gesture to give their time to help take care of her, but she might just want to stay in the hospital. After all, maybe the hospital could fix this. It was a tough choice, however...
1142222.title: Messes her diaper

11422221.content: Dash decided to leave with her friends. She wanted to be around friends. However, she could only stay at one of her friends places. So, which one?
11422221.title: Go with a friend

114222211.content: Twilight and Rarity seemed like much better options. Maybe they could help fix her bowels, or at least make the diaper less visible. She decided to go with.
114222211.title: Twilight or Rarity

114222212.content: Dash decided she wanted to be around closer friends. After all, Applejack, Fluttershy, and Pinkie had far more experience in care taking.
114222212.title: Applejack, Pinkie Pie or Fluttershy

1142222122.content: Pinkie wasn't an option. She was a good friend, but a bit too crazy for Dash's taste. That left only Fluttershy and Applejack. Which one should she go with?
1142222122.title: Other

11422222.content:
"I think I'll stay at the hospital. Y'know... to see if they can't do anything," Dash said. Her friends gave small nods of understanding.

"Of course," Twilight said, "Well be on our way then. We'll make sure to visit often."

"Thanks," Dash said with a small smile. They said their goodbyes and left Dash to sit in the hospital bed. Doctor Horse walked back into the room and closed the door.


"Now, Ms. Dash, would you like a change?" Doctor Horse asked.

heard a knock at her front door, startling her.
114231111122.content:
Fluttershy was about to turn off the lights, until she heard the faint sound of an object dropping to the floor. Turning around, she noticed Rainbow's pacifier sitting on the floor by the side of the bed, and a rather upset-looking Rainbow Dash looking down at it from the bed. Fluttershy walked back over to Rainbow, picked up the pacifier, and plopped it back in her mouth, before it promptly fell out onto the floor again.

At first Fluttershy was confused why Rainbow was so rejective of her pacifier, until she realized that after a few more cycles of it slipping out of her mouth, Rainbow was physically unable to keep the pacifier in. "Oh dear, it seems that crash did more than just make you incontinent, it's dislocated your jaw as well!".

Rainbow tried to speak, but only gibberish came out. She attempted to reach down for her pacifier. Fluttershy understood that Rainbow wanted her pacifier for the night, but could not hold it in her mouth on her own. Suddenly, Fluttershy had an idea. "Wait right here, Dashie!", Fluttershy said, before rushing out of the room and down the stairs.

Moments later, Fluttershy returned with some stretchy plastic bracelets and some scissors. She set the items down on a nearby table and got to work. Rainbow eyed her Mommy carefully, before losing interest and struggling with her pacifier again. After a few moments, Fluttershy walked over to the bed with something in her hoof. "Here Rainbow, I managed to cut the bracelets to form a plastic coil of sorts. Hand me your paci". Rainbow did as she was told and handed Fluttershy her pacifier. After a moment of knot tying, Fluttershy's work was complete.

"There we go! Now it'll stay nice and snug in your little mouth!" Fluttershy said, before taking the now coil-strung pacifier and putting it over Rainbow's head. She looped the back of the coil behind Rainbow's ears, and pulled the pacifier forward, stretching it to as far as it would reach. She then plopped the pacifier back in Rainbow's open mouth, and adjusted the coil so that it strapped the pacifier on Rainbow's face nice and snug.

"Thnnsfks mmffmmnn!" Rainbow exclaimed, happy to have her pacifier back. Flutter tucked Rainbow inside the bed sheets once more. Afterwards, she gave Rainbow another kiss on the forhead, before whispering "Mommy loves you" into her baby's ear. Fluttershy gathered up the scissors and left over coil, turned off the lights, and left the room, making sure to close the door ever so carefully behind her.

Satisfied with her motherly performance, Fluttershy walked downstairs, placing the leftover materials back in the kitchen.

Two hours had passed since Fluttershy decided to put Rainbow to bed, and it was now mid-afternoon. It seemed just the right time to wake Dashie up. Fluttershy...
114231111122.title: ...hearing the sound of Rainbow's pacifier ...

choices: Pinkie ignores her curiosity and goes to look for Fluttershy
1142311111222.content:
After regaining her composure from the sudden knocking, Fluttershy went over to answer the door. She opened it to find Pinkie Pie bouncing excitedly, as usual.

"Hi Pinkie. What brings you here?" Fluttershy smiled. "Heya Fluttershy! It's a beautiful day and I just thought it would be the most amazing-riffic idea to have a picnic! Everypony else agrees! Well, everypony but Dashie at least. She wasn't home or even taking her afternoon nap! Can you believe that?"

"I definitely couldn't see that happening" Fluttershy giggled, thinking of her little Dashie bundled up on the bed with her paci and diaper. "I'll be out in a few minutes. I just need to use the filly's room first" she said to a grinning Pinkie.

As she walked to the bathroom, Fluttershy ran through some ideas that would keep Rainbow occupied while she was gone. Maybe she could play with my foal toys... Oh that would make her so excited! she thought as she could feel Dashie's joy after seeing the blocks and rattles.

Pinkie Pie, meanwhile, was so excited for the picnic that every minute Fluttershy took felt like an hour. After a few anxious minutes, she decided to check on her. As she neared the bathroom, she heard a muffled yawn coming from the bedroom. Wait... that wasn't one of Fluttershy's animals... she thought. Though she was nervous, her curiosity got the best of her and she went to find the source of the noise. She stopped at the bedroom when she heard a hissing noise. Cautiously, she opened the door to find... Rainbow Dash? She looked over her friend, shocked to see her in such foalish attire. A strong smell suddenly hit her nose as she noticed several large bulges in the back of Rainbow's diapers and dampness as well.

Rainbow yawned once again, slowly waking up. She barely even noticed Pinkie staring at her as she smiled and raised her rump in the air.

Pinkie just stared on, confused as to what Dash was doing. Her thinking was interrupted as she heard a few muffled farts. Rainbow grunted, pushing a huge mess into her already loaded double-diaper. As she finished up, she giggled at the smell and feeling of the squishy mess. The moment she had pooped in her diaper for the first time made her so happy. This just felt right, and she had let herself think like a foal, happily giving in to her mommy's caretaking without even a second thought.

Pinkie snapped out of her blank stare. Why is Dashie acting like a foal? she wondered before her eyes wandered over to a stack of diapers. It was her size, the same ones Rainbow was wearing. She pondered, just for a second, about trying one on. C'mon Pinkie! Those are meant for the Cake twins, not adults! But... Dashie does look more comfortable than I've ever seen... Maybe I should give them a shot...

114331.content:
s the start of the weekend the day have dawned and many ponies were up and about already including two friends Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy, Rainbow who was up oddly early for her was practicing flying while fluttershy was feeding her animals nothing odd but as for their other friends every one of them were out of town all over the kingdom on business being it party planning, family meeting or meeting her teacher leaving them away for most the week. Rainbow glided down to Fluttershy’s cottage just as she headed into inside putting her hoof in the door way preventing it closing.

“Flut-“ She huffed out of breath she tongue hanging out like a dog on a boiling hot day, sweating dripped off her fur Fluttershy open the door completely then headed in the other room coming back with a fresh glass of water, Rainbow snatch the glass and swiftly drank it down in one gulped.
“Thanks shy…” Rainbow thanked as she let herself inside Fluttershy closing the door behind her as Rainbow Dash made herself comfy on her friend’s sofa, Fluttershy took a seat next to her. The sound of ponies trotting down the stair caught the two attention look at two moving ponies heading down the stair case

“There miss, all move in.” One mover said before leaving, Rainbow looked to Fluttershy “What was that about?” She ask, Fluttershy replied “Oh my father, he just cleaned his house and found a bunch of child stuff and, and he didn’t want to throw them out so he gave them to me.” All that was said for a few moments were “Oh, I see.”

In these moment it was dead silent not an awkward silent more like a relax silent as Rainbow just sunk into her seat. Fluttershy looked over at Dash “Hey Dash” Fluttershy was shaking like she was in pool of cold water in the middle of winter, Rainbow looked back at her as Fluttershy tried to spark a conversation “You ev-ever thought about children, I mean like having one…” Rainbow snorted slapping herself hardly able to talk now

“Me!? Kids? Me of all ponies, no, no not at all.” She wipe a tear away no longer laughing “what about you?” Fluttershy looked down feeling discouraged now; she took a breath in and said
“Well sometimes, I mean when I am older maybe but closest right now is babysitting. I do have an urge…” Fluttershy felt like an idiot now for bringing it up. “Well I think you would make an awesome mother.” Fluttershy tilled her head “I mean like you kind, nice and caring all them motherly things. What kid wouldn’t want a mother like you.” Fluttershy smile at her friend feeling all warm inside “Sorry about cracking up before, it just the thought of me having a child, it just horrible and just funny at the same time is all.” Rainbow apologised, Fluttershy smirk thinking about a motherly Rainbow Dash

“You’re not really the mother kind.” Fluttershy sighed looking away from Rainbow Dash “I lied, I have babies on the mind and babysitting isn’t a enough now, but a child that little bit too much….I wish I could just get it out of my system is all.” Rainbow put hoof to her chin “Too bad there isn’t a way to like have a fake child for one weekend.” Rainbow said thinking out loud, Fluttershy head lifted she pick herself up off the sofa trotting in front of Rainbow Dash and looking her right in the eyes, staring into them as she spoke

“Rainbow Dash, I am going upstairs there something I need to get, and when you see this something just stray, don’t leave, I mean if you wouldn’t mind” Rainbow just laid back lazing about responded “Sure.” Fluttershy trotted up Stair while Rainbow just flicked on the tv watching a children cartoon to passed the time away. It wasn’t too long before Fluttershy descended down holding a paper bag looking about ready to burst, Rainbow turned her head follow Fluttershy with her eyes as the pony wandered down and headed to the coffee table placing the bag down Rainbow stared at it fascinated by it. Fluttershy pulled a box that was clearly already open with a picture of diaper

“Before you ask, I got these when I mix up buy the babies one while I took care of the cake’s twins.” Rainbow didn’t replied she just looked at the pack not really sure what was happen. “Rainbow, this is a hard thing to ask, I, I want you to be my baby, just for today is all….” Rainbow was at a lost for words she looked at pack of adult mare diaper then to Fluttershy who was shaking and trying to maintain a smile, she thought trying to figure out what to do before deciding.

“Okay, I’ll do it if it will help you get over your whole baby crazy thing.” She announced Fluttershy clapped and cheer softly “But first!” Rainbow put a hoof up “Lets get the ground rule laid out, 1st I am not messing myself at all, no going number 2 in my diaper nothing like that but how ever I may wet it…depending if I drank, and what a drank and how much of it I drank okay. 2nd It just for to day only, as soon as night comes it over.” Rainbow was still far too happy about this and said “Okay no messing and just for today, now lets get you change, come with me” Rainbow grumbled as she was taking up stair. Fluttershy came to the spare room opening it to show a room different from the rest of the cottage a room where the hard wood floor was covered in soft carpet, the walls were decorated with teddy bear wall paper, a toy chest was next to a crib and next to the door was a change table with packs of diapers under it and near that a cabinet filled with baby clothes. Rainbow stood in aw like she fell into a different world.

Fluttershy patted the change table Rainbow got on lying down with her legs stretch out, Rainbow lifted up her flank slipping the puffy diaper under her bottom then doing up the strips as tight as they would go, despite the tightness Rainbow didn’t feeling it being tight to her it felt more fuffy like it was a thick pillow around her flank, she couldn’t even feel the hard wooden table now, now it was this nice soft paddedness of the diaper.

Fluttershy help herself and ask “What does my baby want to do first?” Rainbow just shout one word “play” Fluttershy smiled and ask “Okay I got some blocks, some dolls some legos “ “Legos, me wanna play with lego” Rainbow was already play her role rather well, Fluttershy pulled out a container of lego bricks from the toy box sitting down next to Rainbow

“Okay why don’t we we try making a lego house” Rainbow looked to Fluttershy and told her “Okay mommy.” Rainbow dash started pulling out random bricks and placing them together, Fluttershy petted her head and said “Now Rainbow Dash, maybe we should make sure the colours match.” She started putted together some red bricks for a wall “Like this.” Rainbow nodded and started to rebuilding it with matching colours now, Rainbow smile wider. “Now mommy will be right now.” She petted Rainbow’s head and head out, Rainbow just sat there building her lego house now acting like a small child find herself enjoying this, finding it a wonderful break from the adult world even if it just for a little while.

Fluttershy came back with a pacifier, she sipped it around Rainbow Dash’s neck Rainbow took notice and put the pacifier into her mouth suckling at feeling relax. “Awww, dose my wittle baby enjoy her pacifier?” Rainbow just nodded. After about an hour of play Fluttershy took Rainbow down stairs, Rainbow sat on the sofa, fluttershy tied a bib around her friend neck. Fluttershy headed into the other room coming back with a bowl of porridge, a bottle of piping hot milk. “Okay baby open up.” Rainbow did so as Fluttershy played “Here come the train. Chu, chu.” Putting a spoon full of porridge into Rainbow Dash mouth repeating until it was now, Fluttershy clapped and said “Good baby.” Fluttershy then took the bib off and pick up the bottle of milk. “Do you want me to feed your milk or you wanna try yourself.” Rainbow said “You mommy.” Fluttershy smiled sitting on the sofa and moved her head on to her lap and placing the nipple of the bottle to Fluttershy’s mouth, she sucked at it drinking the now warm milk.

After some cartoon Fluttershy took Rainbow up stairs to the nursery and said “Okay baby, nap time.” She place Rainbow into the crib, she didn’t fit too well feeling cramped in it but still found a way to sleep.

Waking up she saw Fluttershy watching over her, she picked up Rainbow Dash and lied her down on the change table, untapped the diaper seeing Rainbow was till as dry as a bone. “Well Rainbow, thanks for this.” Rainbow just smile and said “Nah It was kind fun..” she head out side and said “Well see later fluttershy, walking out sticking the pacifier in her mouth to relax herself not caring what anypony thought.


Later there was knock at Fluttershy’s door, opening it was Rainbow Dash. “Oh Rainbow I didn’t except you back so soon.” Rainbow smirk “Why not I just did some shopping and fed tank is all.” “Oh shopping,…” “Yep just need to get some pacifiers, some adult diaper some junk food.” Fluttershy was now looking over dash when she herd this “Diapers.” “Yep, some nice puffy diapers I found it nice and I don’t think I could sleep without my pacifier now.” Fluttershy look at it, the pacifier was still wet “Were you sucking on that in public?” “Yep, what? I don’t care about what other ponies think.” Fluttershy smile Rainbow smiled and said “So about this baby think again” “Okay” I mean like a few days every week” Fluttershy smiled hard and said with glee “That more then fine with me sweetie.” Rainbow yawn, Fluttershy petted her and said “Lets get a diaper on you and into bed” Rainbow smiled hugging fluttershy “Can I sleep in your bed tonight, that crib a bit too tight.” “Sure thing baby” Fluttershy diaper her once again and the two fell asleep then….
114331.title: Baby Rainbow and mama Fluttershy.

1143312.content:
A week passed and all her friend had found out about Rainbow’s little kink and were understanding of it, Pinkie found it cute Apple jack said she thought nothing of it and Rarity said it was harmless compared to other things she seen it the city. Twilight was late to finding out as she was in canterlot all week, the first being she did was return a book about animals to Fluttershy and found her and Rainbow Dash in the middle of playing in the living room, she was understandable shock at first but was cool when explained.

Fluttershy told Rainbow that she was going to be away this weekend which Rainbow was fine with having a sleep over with Twilight that weekend anyway so it all worked out. That Saturday night after the moon was high in the black night sky Rainbow head to Twilight not bothering with things such as knock, or a door, an open window would do just fine for her that lead to her head first into a book case. “Hi Rainbow Dash.” Twilight greeted getting more used to this happing every week to her, Rainbow Dash shook her head and said “Hey.” She stood up “Might if I use your bathroom for a sec?” “Its no problem” Twilight said started to clean up the books with her magic, Rainbow headed to the bath room.

Twilight was nearly done putting everything in order again when Rainbow came back wearing a puffy sky blue diaper much the same colour as her coat and a pacifier around her neck. Twilight was surprised “Umm Rainbow…” Rainbow glared and said “What it helps me relax? I can take it off if you have a problem?” Twilight shook her head and said “No it fine.” And went back to cleaning up, Rainbow smirk she stuck out her arms and gripped Twilight casing her to drop everything “Rainbow!” Rainbow just looked into her eyes and explained “What I am a little baby who mama is out of town and I need a hug.” Twilight sigh and said “No, I am not doing this.” She tired to get Rainbow off but all it did was make her grabbed tighter, it went on for a minute or so until she said “Fine.” And hugged Rainbow Dash, Rainbow hugged back and then let go Walking off. Twilight looked at her and said “Wait!” Rainbow halted and listen “Rainbow…..” Twilight started and then said....

1151221111.content:
*At Almost Night*

Fluttershy just finished putting all the animals on their beds when she suddenly hear a weak *crack* sound.

She starts to shiver but walks slowly to the door and open it . . .

She finds RainbowDash looking away.

"RainbowDash A-A-Are You F-Feling O-ok?" Said the now very scared Fluttershy.

". . . Ha . . . HA . . . HAHA!" RainbowDash looked to Fluttlershy with a creepy smile covered in 'blood'.

"AHHHH!" Fluttershy jumped back to the inside of the cottage and fell on the floor almost crying while covering her eyes.

"hahahaha! Flutters you should have seen your face!" RainbowDash wiped the fake blood of her mouth and laughed more.

Fluttershy's bladder lost the control and the poor peed herself without noticing and leaving a large yellow puddle on the floor.
Fluttershy started to cry because of the fear.

"ha...ha...?" RainbowDash stoped her laugh "Fluttershy are you o-" She suddenly gashped while seeing the puddle on the floor.
"Oh gosh! , Fluttershy i'm so sorry!" RainbowDash walked closer to Fluttershy and tried to calm her.
"Sorry Flutters!, I Didn't expect that reaction"

"R-rainbow? *sobs* It's ok . . . I-i'm ok *sob*" She said while slowly getting up.

RainbowDash hugged her while Fluttershy was sobbing.
"I'm sorry i won't do it again, i promise."

Suddenly Fluttershy noticed how wet was her leg fur and the yellow puddle.
"Oh. . . my. . ." "I-i i didn't know. . ."

"It's ok FlutterShy I'll take care of that" Said RainbowDash while gabbing a mop and starting to clean the puddle.

*After Fluttershy calmed down sitting on the sofa and RainbowDash ended cleaning the floor*

"Finished *Sigh*" Rainbow looked at Fluttershy and sat by her side.
"Are you feeling better Flutters?"

"Yes RainbowDash don't worry"

"Sorry Fluttershy i didn't expected that you were gonna. . . well ya know, sorry."

"It's ok Rainbow you weren't trying to make me. . . scare that much"

"Fluttershy . . ." Said RainbowDash.

She then screwed the nipple caps back on each one, and handed them out to each pony. "Now each of you drink up! Mommy wants you all to become big and strong!"

Each of the three diapered ponies suckled the sweet tasting liquid from their bottles. Rarity heavily enjoyed the taste, yet she found that more she sucked and sucked, the harder it was to keep focus. When she had finally finished the bottle, she noticed her head feeling quite strange. She tried to tell the others of her feeling, but found her lips barely responsive, and a few drops of drool dripping down onto her diaper. Rarity looked over to the other ponies and noticed the safe effects. Rainbow Dash began rolling around on the bed, making baby-like sounds. Sweetie Belle also began to roll over, sucking on her hoof.

Fluttershy was pleased that her formula was beginning to take effect. "Aww, do some weak and helpless ponies need their Mommy?" Fluttershy teased.

A series of laughter and more good sucking followed from the three ponies. Fluttershy took that as a yes. She took off her pacifier necklace, and took another out of her bag, and went over to each of the three ponies. First soothing the little ponies, then proceeding to ease the soft plastic nipple of the pacifier past their drool covered lips. Each baby pony began suckling on their paci, and they instantly showed signs of calming down.

Rarity began to feel safe and warm in her Mommy's comfort. As she sucked and sucked, she knew that whatever need or want that cd across her, herMommy would be able to fulfill. It was at that point that Rarity began to feel rumbling in her stomach. The laxative began to take effect, and Rarity slowly began to feel a warm liquid spreading across the front of her diaper. Moments later, Rarity's bowels began to shift, and Rarity felt her diaper quickly fill up with the warm, gooey substance. Rarity couldn't remember the last time she had defiled her diaper this much. "Woah, hey I almost fell." said Rainbow skillfully using her wings to keep balance on the bed. "Oh, sorry Rainbow Dash." blushed the orange filly. Rainbow Dash, lifting up Scoots, carried them both over to the blocks where they’d stay a while.

They sat together on the carpet feeling content. After a moment of playing with Scootaloo, Rainbow, in the comfort of her own diaper, decided to read a book she'd brought along, occasionally helping the filly find something to add to the tower. Scootaloo having a blast all the way, would thank her with baby talk often in the form of muffled sounds coming through her pacifier. And while Rainbow couldn’t understand a word said to her, she’d improvise as best she could for the sake of Scoot’s enjoyment and yet a little for her own desires. However, soon the filly felt her stomach rumbling followed by a familiar growling to disrupt the silence.

"Sounds like some little pony's gettin’ hungry." inquired Dash. Scoots felt herself blushed at this "y-yeah." She admitted in a shy tone, holding the pacifier to her muzzle before instinctively sucking on it again. Dash chuckled "ok squirt, c'mon I'll fix you up something to eat." said the mare as she flew over and scooped up the filly, carrying her out the door and over into the kitchen where she spotted a high chair fit for Scootaloo, gently setting her in it. The filly became secured as the diaper gave her less potential for movement, when suddenly she caught herself drooling slightly over her paci, making her peculiarly pull it out from her mouth and wipe.

Rainbow took a peek into the fridge and surprisingly there were a variety of foal foods from assorted vegetable mush in small jars to small leaves and formula. She takes one of the jars of mush to give to waiting Scootaloo. Like an impatient foal, Scoots removed the lid and decided on holding the jar with both hooves and unsteadily pouring it at her mouth, messing her fur a little in the process. “Hey, what do you think you’re...” scolded the cyan pegasus while lowering the jar from the confused filly’s coy face. *quick hard sigh* She got a rag and dampened it at the sink. “Here” she wiped down the orange filly’s reddened face as she flinched at the cold of the rag, yet still, inside her heart melted with the care of her idol. Rainbow taking out a spoon next asked “Do you want me to feed you instead Scoots?” In that instance, Scootaloo overwhelmed with glee shouted “YES!” almost jumping out of her seat before catching herself and slowly nodding into a “I mean, yes please.”

In time, Scootaloo is found indulging herself in each spoon-full of mashed fruits and veggies served by the mare. Amazing it was how every bit seemed only tastier than the last she thought. Rainbow Dash fed her jar after jar as she’d ask for more to Rainbow’s surprise, as if the filly could never get enough. Sure the cute chanting of “more, more!” and occasional drops of food would mean extra work and caring towards the filly, but finding multiple opportunity for “Here comes the train” followed by airplane noises and the anticipation and excitable look on the filly’s face made it totally worth it to her.
