123311.content:
Right when Rarity sat her sister back down in her nursery, a faint knocking sound went almost unheard at the door. 'Is someone there?' She quickly thought.

"Um, Rarity, may I?" a small voice spoke belonging to a recognized canary-yellow pony.

'Fluttershy' "Oh, come in darling!"

The shy mare peaked her head through the doorway before entering to meet her approaching friend with a rather social "Oh, hi Rarity. I just thought I'd stop by on my way back from the drug store." she says wiping her hoofs a little on the door mat.
"You mean that new place at the edge of town?" says Rarity focusing her magic to straighten out one the front window curtains of the boutique.
"Yes, (although it's been open for a month now) a-and next to it, I know a guy selling all kinds of animal caring needs." she states.
"Ah that's nice." replies a blissful-in-thought Rarity

Catching her attention "Oh, by the way, I bought you some supplies, and some silk in a variety of tones to repay you for the dress you made me last week-end." "Aw Fluttershy you didn't have to..." "Oh but I wanted to, the dress is really a work of art. After all, the birds seem to think it complements my appearance in the morning." She mused into a chuckle with Rarity giggling a bit to the idea. "Is that so?"

Fluttershy taking off with her mouth having set the bigger of the two saddlebags she carried down to a side, recalled her curiosity asking "Um, I wanted to ask if you were free later to go on another spa date with me again? You haven't offered all week so I was kinda, <small>hoping you'd accept my offer this time.</small>" the shy one lowered in volume as she talked, hoping not to have impeded on her friends busy work.

Rarity reassured "Oh, sorry about that dearie. I've only been taking care of Sweetie Belle and merely working on some new design of mine. Both jobs just take a slight more time outta the day; plus some business errands to run."
123311.title: Catching up

1233111.content:
"Your sister?" her attention finally directed towards the third pony in the room. "Oh, i-is everything alright?"

"Nothing's the matter darling, um." Rarity motions for her friend to move closer "Sweetie Belle just likes to play around in diapers like a little foal sometimes, I've been looking after her and ahem, occasionally babying her too." she sheepishly claimed.

Starring somewhere between Rarity and her sister, Fluttershy took a moment to process the situation "Oh, that's adorable that you two are sharing that bond again." she said "Though I don't quite understand how this all started."

"Oh Sweetie and I have done this for a good while now. Only now did she decide to take it outside the bedroom." admitted the curly-maned unicorn. She knew how her filly sister desired to roam in her diapered rear beyond the limits of the nursery back in her room. "She hasn't however told her friends about any of it yet."

The whole while, Sweetie Belle had remained unusually preoccupied with her playtime to notice the yellow mare who stepped in earlier, subconsciously believing in her sister to redirect that pony's attention until they'd left. Unfortunately for Sweetie she'd done just the opposite in letting her friend in.

"I always thought the last thing a filly would want is to be seen toiling with anything foal-ish." Said the pegasus discovering interest as she started to a small pen to the side of the boutique. 'Not my baby sister.' thought Rarity as she let out a giggle.

Fluttershy walked over to the littler unicorn wearing a rather thick disposable diaper whiter than herself displaying depictions of flower pedals over her tush as she bent down to scoop a block under the changing table. With her casually gentle approach she said "Hello there Sweetie Belle."

With a forming wet spot going unnoticed, Fluttershy went on to ask "Oh, um, did I frighten you? I'm sorry. I wanted to ask how you're doing." The mare consolingly claimed.

"I-I'm, fine..." Sweetie meekly replied with voice trembling at the concerned turquoise in those eyes of a shy pegasus towering over her. She felt herself tilt backwards onto her rear end, her landing accompanied by an audible *squish* easily heard by every pony in the room.

B-bu- when d-did I even-...?" going from foaling around to confused and discomforted, only naturally had Sweetie felt her emotions escalating into tears, and tears upbringing shrill cries, which by no exception was cut short by Fluttershy popping a dinky in Sweetie's mouth before her chance to make sound. "There we go. I know, that felt icky didn't it?"

Seconds later Rarity finally attended asks "Was that my little Belle just now? Did she have another accident?" Hovering over the nursery, Fluttershy was found cradling Sweetie softly in her hooves, cooing to her in the way only a mare with delicate creatures as a cutie mark could. The young filly found the mere minutes of cradling and cooing more soothing than suckling on her pacifier all day long, and in feeling a tad bit too relieved, ended up peeing herself further until her bladder was empty. 'Looks like Fluttershy does an even better job than I would' Rarity thought to herself, 'umm...' at least until she saw what her sister was doing.

But before she could do anything, the bedroom door slowly opened to reveal Applejack trotting through with a small smile on her face.

         "How ya' doin' Babs? Is' quite early in th' mornin' for a lil' filly like yerself' to be up at this time. Is it 'cause'a that diaper 'a yers'?" Applejack whispered, she turned her head slyly making sure that none of her family woke up. She trotted right up to the filly and patted her mane.

         Babs looked down at the ground and whimpered a little, starting to feel a little embarrassed that Applejack of all ponies had to come in at this time and see her in her big baby diaper.

         "Yer' ma' an' pa' tol' me about yer' wettin' and messin' problems at night. They mentioned on the letter from Manehatten about ya' takin' care of ya'self durin' th' day, if ya' want me to ah'll change ya' quickly an' ya'll can go back t' bed. How 'bout that?"

Diamond and Silver noticed the other two crusaders, Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo walking up to the farm who both tried their best in hold in their laughter upon seeing Celestia.
"Hey guys!" Applebloom shouted as she ran up to her friends while Applejack noticed something peculiar about Celestia.
'Wait a minute, where'd her cutie mark go?' Applejack wondered as she stared at the blank area of Celestia's flank.
"So what's up you guys?" Applebloom greeted her friends who both still stared at Celestia with their laughter suppressed.

"Just replace the boring balls with dangerous stuff like chainsaws!" This made the four other fillies go wide eyed.
"Lets pass on that one." Applebloom stated with a shake of her head.
"You blank flanks should just give up on that silly obsession and realize you have no talent. Just like little Celly here!" Diamond tugged on the leash to lower Celestia's head and began to pet it. "Isn't that wight Celly Welly?" Diamond spoke to Celestia like a foal who just nodded slowly.
"Don't lump us in with a big foal Diamond!" Scootaloo shouted which made Applebloom walk up to her.
"Hey, stop it! Celestia may not be able to control herself, but think of all the good things she's done in the past for everyone! She may not look like an adult anymore, but she still has her cutie mark to show who she really is." Applebloom said.
"What cutie mark?" Silver turned Celestia to the side and revealed her blank bottom which made the crusaders gasp.
"Don't try to make this baby look good Applebloom, she's lost it all, her kingdom, her title, her loyal subjects, heck even her cutie mark now realized what a big loser she is!" Diamond laughed mockingly at Celestia who whimpered at the true statement.
"Maybe now Celly can learn how to get a new cutie mark with you guys?" Silver giggled.
"No way! I'd rather do the juggling thing then have her join the crusaders! At least we're TRYING to mature, but she just went ahead and threw away everything to become a baby!" Sweetie Belle exclaimed and walked past the overgrown foal to the farm.
"Ditto." Scootaloo followed Sweetie Belle.

"Ouch. What do you have to say about Celly Applebloom?" Silver smirked.
Applebloom looked at Celestia and just shook her head.
"I'm sorry Celly." Applebloom looked down as we walked past the three. "You gotta grow up before you can get a cutie mark." She walked off to join her friends.

Silver Spoon pulled out a camera and pointed at Celestia who was trying to get used to her new apparel. Diamond Tiara giggled and walked over to Celly with a smirk.
"So miss former princess, what are you going to do now since you're just a big foal?" Diamond asked mockingly.
"I-I don't know, I just want my life back." Celestia began to tear up which Silver snapped a couple of shots at, she motioned to Diamond to make her cry harder.
"D'aww, but you shouldn't have made poopies on yourself then, now everyone in Canterlot will just laugh at the name Celestia instead of respecting it." Diamond shrugged as she smirked at the alicorn who was starting to cry even harder.
"It's not my fault! I don't know what happened! I just can't control my bowels anymore!" Celestia shouted as she stood up which gave Silver a perfect picture.
"Sounds like somepony just decided she loved diapers more than a crown. Heck, I bet anyone in this school could be a better princess than you were, like me for instance!" Diamond wandered off into her mind where she imagined herself as an alicorn princess, until she was brought back to reality by her friend Silver coughing loudly.
"That is absurd! A princess is both honourable and magical. Something you are neither of you brat!" Celestial said to Diamond who at that moment, snapped.
"Excuse me?! This coming from an overgrown foal! A former princess who fills her diapers constantly! A big whiny baby who even I can punish if I feel like it!" Diamond grabbed Celestia, pulled the alicorn over her lap and began to spank the overgrown foal while the entire class was now watching mouths agape.
"Ow! Stop it! Stop this at once young filly!" Celestia shouted as she tried to get away, but she was too weak to fight back.
"Make me baby Celly! Why don't you use your alicorn magic? Oh wait, I forgot, you're too stupid to use it anymore!" Diamond unbuttoned the bottom of Celestia's onesie and pulled the alicorn's diaper back as she proceeded to spank her bare bottom.
"Ow! Please! I beg of you stop it! It hurts!" Celestia shouted which only got her harder spanks while a crowd of kids formed around the two and began laughing.
"If you want me to stop just say a simple sentence baby Celly." Diamond smirked as she continued to spank.
"Fine! I'll say anything! Just please stop!" Celestia screamed.
"Okay, I want you to say: ' Diamond Tiara deserves to be a princess more than a stinky butt like me!'" Diamond said with a wicked smile as she got out a tape recorder.
Celestial sighed as all the laughing kids grew silent to hear this.
"Diamond Tiara deserves to be a princess more than a stinky butt like me." Celestial dropped her head in shame as she was pushed off Diamond's lap and in front of a crowd of laughing foals.
"Well that was satisfying!" Diamond exclaimed to Silver.
"So what now?" Silver asked.
"Simple, we..."

13211.content:
"Oh, so baby Luna wants to piss me off even more by spoiling the carpets, hmm? Well then, babies need to be diapered!" Celestia said, having enough of her sister.

Celestia retrieved a pair of 4x padded diapers from Cadance and Shining's foal nursery and levitated it in front of Luna. Luna looked puzzlingly at the soft material, before screaming "No, me a big girl, me no wear diaper!".

"Babies who pee themselves need diapers, Luna!" Celestia shouted, as she levitated the thrashing Luna up into the air. She undid the straps on the diaper, and proceeded to place it on Luna's rear, strapping the sides back together with tape. Celestia decided to fuse the tape straps and the diaper under each with her magic so 'temper tantrum' Luna wouldn't pull it off in protest.

"No! Diapers for babies! Me no baby!" Luna shrieked.

"LUNA, I HAVE HAD ENOUGH OF YOUR WHINING!" Celestia said, levitating a baby pacifier from the nursery across the hall, and before shoving it into Luna's mouth. Celestia then levitated over some rolls of duct tape from a nearby drawer, and proceeded to wrap the tape around Luna's head and over the pacifier, effectively locking it in place. Luna tried to scream, but only a muffled "Mmffpphh!" came out. Satisfied with the new Luna, Celestia levitated her new baby sister into Cadance and Shining's nursery, and placed her inside. The relatively high walls would keep Luna from jumping out.

To prevent Luna from causing any more harm, Celestia took a last few strands of duct tape and wrapped them around Luna's wings to keep her from flying. She then went back to her room and pulled out a small ring from her bedside drawer, and came back into the nursery. Celestia secured the ring over baby Luna's horn, cutting off any magic that she tried to conjure.

Celestia took a step back and admired her new baby sister. "See? This is what happens to whiney foals. You will spend a few weeks here until you have learned your lesson."

Luna tried to protest, but her bindings only let out a muffled whine.

"Now, I'm off to go fulfill my royal duties. Don't worry? I'll do your part of raising and lowering the moon, while I tell every pony else that you are on holiday. I will be back later to check on you dear sister, and don't even think about misbehaving." Celestia stated firmly as she trotted out of the room.

Luna was upset. She tried bashing against the walls of the nursery, but they didn't budge. She tried levitating herself out, or smashing the gate with her magic, but as a foal's age, Luna was unable to concentrate, and the ring secured around her horn diminished even the slightest attempt of magic. Luna began to curl up into a ball and sob. Her cries muffled by the pacifier that she had no choice but to suck endlessly on. Just when she wanted to be left alone, who walked into the room but...

Shining would expect her back in time for tea. "So, same time next month?" Cadence asked, magically removing her girly attire. "Sure thing!" Celestia replied.

Solaria took the foals upstairs to the bathroom. After drawing a bath of warm water, she places the foals in it. Celestia sighed as the warm water touched her coat, and so did Luna.

Solaria took a scrubbing brush and began to lightly scrub Celestia's stomach. Celestia sighed.

"This feels good", she said in her mind. Solaria was able to read her mind.

"I'm glad you like it, Celly", she said back to Celestia in her own mind. After scrubbing Luna, she heard Celestia's and Luna's stomach rumble. "Does somepony want a snack before their nap?"

"Yes, Mommy", they both said.

"What do you want?", Solaria said. Both foals thought about it, before deciding on...
1323321122212121121.title: Bath time

choices: Celestia wakes up in a messy diaper
Luna wakes up in a messy diaper
13233211222121211211.content:
Solaria smiled as she dried the foals off with the towel. She then brought them back into the kitchen. She gave them each three chocolate chip cookies and sat them on her lap while she sat in a rocking chair.

Luna happily ate her cookies, but Celestia chewed them slowly with a sad look on her face. Solaria took notice of this and and talked to Celestia in her mind.

"What's wrong, Celly?", she said.

"Mom", Celestia said, "Why did you turn me and Luna into foals? I'm not being disrespectful, but I just want to know".

"Sweetie", Solaria said, "Don't take it the wrong way. I'm not mad at you or anything. I just wanted to take care of you like foals".

"So, we are going to be princesses again, right?"

"Yes, Sweetie. Just give me a few months to be princess, so I can take care of my little fillies again". Celestia smiled and hugged her mother.

"Thank you, Mommy", she said in her mind.

"You're welcome, Celly. Now, eat your cookies so I can lay you down for a nap.". Celestia did and so did Luna.

After that, Solaria went upstairs and tucked the fillies in their crib. After saying goodnight, Solaria turned off the light.
13233211222121211211.title: "Cookies!"

choices: Luna wakes up and the three alicorns go to the park
Solaria puts Celesta back in the crib
132332112221212112111.content:
Celestia woke up when a strong odor passed by her muzzle. She felt something squish under her flank when sitting up. She had messed herself. Luckily, Solaris had come into the nursery.

"Mommy?", Celestia said. Solaria smiled and picked up her older foal.

"What is it, Celly?", she said. Celesta blushed lightly.

"I kinda... made a stinky in my diapee". Solaria checked Celestia's diaper.

"You did". She carried her to the changing table and changed her diaper. After that...

1323321122212121121112.content:
Solaria then places Celestia back into the crib.

Celestia, for some reason, doesn't wish to be free of her mother, "D-don't go, mommy..."

Solaria was turning away to walk out when those words connected.

Swiveling around faster than what was possible, she asked with a motherly...and slightly insane grin, "You desire my attention? My child...you can stay in mother's hug forever, if it were your wish."

Carefully picking Celestia from the crib, Solaria held her foal to her chest, just in bliss from Celestia needing to be close.

Celestia really didn't know why she asked to be hugged...but the warmth from her mommy's...err, mother's love sent all the thoughts away for the time being.

Solaria, after a few minutes, brought Celestia to her face, "Does baby love mommy?"

Celestia blinked...then answered as a bit of drool escaped her lips as well, "Goo!"

Solaria evilly laughed, saying, "Awww! Mommy loves her little diapered child, too! And, mommy's got a special suprise! We're gonna wait until Luna has awakened and been changed first, then it's showtime!"

"Good morning, Woona", she said, picking up the younger foal. She sniffed the air. "Smells like somepony needs their diapee changed". Solaria changed Luna. "Now, I have a special surprise for my little fillies".

"What is it, Mommy?", Celestia said.

"I wanna know", Luna said. Solaria smiled.

"I'm going to take you to..."

Solaria, with Celestia and Luna in their strollers, entered the park.

Celestia suckled from a baby bottle...while Luna just stared at her in shock.

Luna asked her oddly-behaving sister, "What's...the matter with you, 'sis? I know we're babies and all, but that doesn't mean we have to just accept it."

Celestia pulled the bottle away, giggling, "None da matter! Me a baby! You baby! We both have momma to take care for us! Life is awesome!"

Luna suddenly saw Celestia gain a wider smile, "What are you-"

Then, she heard Celes's effort to use the bathroom.

Solaria stopped the stroller, walked directly in front of the foals, and asked Celestia, "How's it going, wittle Celes?! My, my! Somepony's trying to make a mess in their diapee! You like being a baby, especially one who loves to go in a diaper, right?"

1323321122212121121112211.content:

"Now my little Celly is a stinky baby, isn't she", Solaria said. Celestia nodded happily. "OK, Mommy will change you when we get to the park".

"OK, Mommy", Celestia said, just finishing.

Then, Luna felt her own need to poop, as she felt a strong pressure in her stomach.

"Great, now I have to go", she said in her mind. Celestia was able to read her mind.

"Then go in your diaper", she said back, "You'll like it".

Luna really didn't want to go in the diaper, but she knew she couldn't hold it long.

13233211222121211211122111.content:
Luna, unable to fight the pressure much longer, looked at Celestia.

"Are you sure, Tia?", Luna said.

"Mm-hmm", Celestia said, fondling with her messy diaper.

Luna grunted, pushing out her waste into the back of her diaper. At first, she yelped, feeling her waste fill up. But after she was finished, it started to feel good. Luna couldn't help but sigh loudly, the pressure gone and the warmth taking over. The combined smells of Celestia's and her own messy diapers reached Solaria's muzzle.

"Looks like I have two stinky babies now", she said. Luna giggled and pressed the back of her diaper with her hoof in anyway she could, smiling as she felt her warm poo smush around her flank. Celestia smiled.

"I towd you", Celestia said, smushing her own diaper. Luna looked at the foal bottle in Celestia's lap, halfway filled up with milk. A blush appeared on her face.

"Tia", she said, "Can I have some of your baba?" Celestia smiled and nodded, giving Luna her bottle. Luna happily suckled, enjoying the flavor of the warm milk. Luna drank some, then let Celestia suckle. They kept passing the bottle back and forth, enjoying the warm milk. Solaria couldn't help but smile.

"Aww...", she said, "Look at my little fillies, sharing their baba with each other". Soon, the foals ran out of their tasty milk. Solaria noticed the sad look on their faces. "Don't worry, my little princesses, I brought two extra babas for you. You can have them when we get there". The fillies smiled. Celestia looked at Luna.

"Woona?", she said. Luna looked at her big sister.

"Yes, Tia?", she said.

"Can I... cuddle wit you?", Celestia said. Luna smiled and nodded, holding her hooves out to Celestia. Celestia moved closer to Luna and hugged her, not even bothered by the smell of her poopy diaper. "I wuv you, Woona".

"I wuv you too, Tia", Luna said, giving Celestia a small kiss on her cheek. Celestia nuzzled Luna on her cheek and snuggled into her coat.

"Aww...", Solaria said under her breath, not wanting to disturb her fillies, "They love each other. I have to save this moment!" She pulled out her camera and took a picture of the hugging fillies. Then, she quickly put it away. Solaria continued to push the stroller until they finally reached the park.

"Big sissy", Luna said, "I dun wanna bite woo. I dun wike seeing woo in pain. It make me sad".

Luna really didn't want to bite her sister, but she also wanted her place as princess back, and she knew Celestia did also. Clenching her eyes shut, she opened her mouth and bit down on Celestia's hoof as hard as her little foal jaws let her. Luna's baby teeth were small, but they did the job, sinking into Celestia's flesh, causing blood immediately. Celestia screamed from the pain, alerting Solaria.

"Oh, Tia", she said, "What happened?" While Solaria was handling Celestia, Luna...

132332112222111112221.title: Wet and Messy Pinkie

choices: Solaria is upset that Luna abandoned court.
1323321122221112.content:
Luna's ears folded back and her lip started to tremble as she saw all the ponies who used to respect her assault her with laughter as she filled up her diaper. She could feel the mess filling up her diaper, the discoloration spreading towards the front more and more. Advertising for all the ponies around her shame.
Taking a deep breath Luna tried raising her voice "My subjects please-" However it still sounded as more of a whimper and was completely drowned out by the laughter which now resonated in the great halls of the courtroom.
She could feel herself. On the throne, the center of attention and scrutiny her diaper on full display. How were they going to take her seriously after this?!
Whimpering Luna tried to retreat into her throne and pressed her ears hard against her skull. "no, no, no" She whimpered and felt so vulnerable. She was alone; on the throne, at the center of attention and scrutiny, her messy diaper on full display. How were they going to take her seriously after this?!
Tears leaked from her eyes and she shook her head. Trying desperately to imagine herself someplace else. She imagined herself in mommy’s embrace. Free from stress, free from pain, free from humiliation. In mommy’s warm soft embrace there was no shame in her diaper, she could wear it as much as she wanted. She could be free and finally safe.

Her eyes still closed Luna jumped out of her throne and sprinted out of the room. Tears streaming from her eyes as she sprinted back to the nursery. She needed to be back in mommy's safe embrace. Finally after going through the endless hallways of the castle she finally saw the light that was the safety of the nursery and burst through.
1323321122221112.title: Throneroom break down

choices: Luna nods firmly and returns right away.
Luna nods sadly and asks for a change before she returns.
Luna sobs and begs not to.
13233211222211121.content:
Luna burst into the room and fell down sobbing. Hoping her mommy would come to console her.
“Luna?” As she looks up she sees Solaria approach her with a curious look on her face. “Why are you here?”
Not bothering to answer her question Luna hugs her mommy. “MOMMY! T-they all laughed at me!” Pushing her snout into her mommy’s warm embrace Luna cries out her fears and humiliation. Finally thinking she was safe.
However she was immediately shocked out of that when she was pushed outwards. Her mother then looked her firmly in the eye. “You abandoned court because they laughed at you?” Luna looked up shocked.
“But Mommy!-” Luna tried to protest but shut up almost immediately as she felt her mother’s hard gaze on her.
Solaria then held up her hoof firmly. “Luna you are a princess”
Luna felt her heart ache and sniffed “But- mommy” coming out as a barely audible whimper.
“Luna, you have a responsibility as princess to hold court no matter how hard it is” Solaria let up on her icy glare but Luna could still feel her displeasure.
She had displeased her mommy and the very idea filled her with dread. “I- I understand”
“Good, now I want you to go back to the throne room and apologize to those ponies you abandoned” She puts her hoof underneath Luna’s chin to look her directly in the eye. “Understood?” She asked with a clear and firm tone that made Luna pay the upmost attention.
Seeing her mother look at her so disappointed filled Luna with regret. Those ponies depended on her as their princess and she had just ran off.
13233211222211121.title: The duties of a princess

choices: Luna nods hesitantly and asks for something to cover her diaper with.
Luna nods eagerly and gets off the changing table.
Luna dares to defy her mother and refuses to go.
132332112222111212.content:
Luna looked up into the eyes of her mother, as she was forced to, and had to admit defeat. She nodded slowly, with her watery eyes pronounced even more as they closed and let some new tears run down her cheeks. “Yes, mommy… But can I please-”
Her mother cut her off and answered her question before she could even get to finish asking it. “Of course I’ll change you first. It won’t do for you to walk around all messy and stinky like that and less so for me to let you do it.”
That made Luna smile a little bit, and her mother rewarded her with a kiss on her snout. “Now come on up on the changing table sweetie. We can’t let the nobles wait too long.”
And so Luna nodded and walked to the changing table in the nursery, her quite full pair of foal knickers squishing as she moved, constantly reminding her of it’s presence, and that she had made it. Something every noble now knew as well. She got up onto the table with a small leap aided by her wings, and laid on her back. Her mother quickly went on to change her, and rather fast at that, especially considering the mess she was dealing with, but she had wiped, powdered and re-diapered Luna’s behind with an ocean blue diaper within two minutes.
“Do you feel ready now, my little princess?”
132332112222111212.title: A short break and a change

choices: A yellow one that looked tight and too small. It would certainly show her diaper
A pink one that looked mature enough but it was slightly too big and bright pink
A magenta one that fit her rather well but had foalish images
1323321122221112121.content:
Nodding solemnly Luna knew she had no choice. But instead of jumping off right away she sits up onto the changing table. “Mommy,” She couldn’t help but choke up. Despite her elevated position Solaria still towered over her.
“Yes dear? Is there still something you need to tell me?” She lowers herself and looks at her honestly. Despite not looking overly hostile Luna felt she couldn’t lie to her mommy.
“C-can I wear a dress please?”
This was apparantely not what she expected Solaria paused and pursed her lips. Digesting the request as Luna hoped for her to agree. She raised her head and looked towards the ceiling, Luna looked at her nervously awaiting her response.
“If you would like to but everypony already knows of your diapers”
Luna looked away. She knew her mommy had a point but still-
“I want it! I just can’t bear those nobles staring at my diaper like that”
“Alright” Solaria stepped away as Luna jumped off the changing table. She looked as her mother walked to the closet. Her powerful mane and tail obscuring the furniture piece entirely. The mane was similar to her daughters’, but a deep crimson and magenta rather than a rainbow or night sky.
“Hmm, let’s seee-” Luna kept watching as the giant alicorn went through the wardrobe. As much as she and her sister looked powerful, she had always felt scared of her mother. She had so much power and more than that she was always right. She could never think of her mother being wrong.
“Ah! These will do” Luna is snapped out of her thoughts as Solaria turns around and presents her with 3 dresses. None of which were anywhere close to her favorites.
“Mommy can’t I have some others?”
“These are the only ones of your size here and we can’t have those nobles waiting just so you can go and get dressed. Choose one and make it quick!”
“But mommy-”
“You have 10 seconds. 9, 8, 7-”
1323321122221112121.title: Knows she has little choice

13233211222211121211.content:
Luna quickly looked between them. Neither seemed really good but being seen in just a diaper seemed even worse.
“3, 2, 1-”
“Yellow! I’ll wear yellow!”
Solaria simply nodded and wasted no time guiding her daughter’s legs and wings through the dress to make it sit tight on her. Within yet again two minutes, Luna was wearing a dress which stood out in a decent way to her coat. The yellow contrasted against her dark blue and unfortunately the skirt seemed to highlight her diapered bottom more so than hiding it.
Luna looked back at herself in the mirror, regretting her decision immensely. She wasn’t given a lot of time to regret it however, before her mother gave her a push on her flank towards the door.
“Hurry up sweetie, you have a night court to be present at.” Luna looked back at Solaria, with the hint of a prayer in her eyes. She was about to open her mouth again when she saw Solaria’s horn light up and to her horror a paddle appeared. “If you return here again before night court has concluded, you’ll be subjected to 100 spanks with a paddle. Is that clear, Luna?” Luna quickly nodded as she knew her mother was serious.
She tried to think of alternative choices but with the ulimatum her mother had set there were none. So, defeated, the obviously padded princess started trotting out of the nursery and through the hallways of Canterlot castle, her thickly diapered rear crinkling with every movement her hind legs made. With her blue diaper peeking out from behind her yellow foalish dress it seemed to be even more obvious than before. ‘At least it was dry crinkles’, she thought to herself.
When Luna returns to her night court she will be met with...
13233211222211121211.title: Getting dressed for court

132332112222111212112.content:
As Luna entered the throne room she looked around. The ponies were still largely where they had been when she left. Murmuring arose, and when they saw the princess return they grinned slightly. The bright and colorful yellow dress made Luna feel almost more like a foal but she knew she had to deal with that fact, and sat back on her throne.
“M-my excuse, court is now back in session”
Her words didn’t seem to carry much weight however, as the murmurs of the ponies gathered in the throne room did not cease. She felt like she had lost her power, like she was simply an observer from an elevated position. Instead of letting that be the case, she cleared her throat quietly and then spoke with a voice that was anything but quiet.
“COURT IS BACK IN SESSION!” Luna shouted.
The sound reverberated around the throne room and several ponies covered their ears, right away lowering her voice. She had promised not to resort to the royal canterlot voice anymore. She just hoped Mommy didn’t know about this as she might get that 100 paddle punishment after all.
Nevertheless it was effective as all the ponies looked back at her with a serious expression. “Silverblade’s request has been denied. Next one!” Luna didn’t sound like herself but the knowledge that they still respected her put her at ease.
132332112222111212112.title: Smirks and grins, but silence.

1323321122221112121121.content:
Despite the crinkling diaper most ponies respected Luna still and the court resumed as normal. For Luna it was mostly just the normal fair of farmers with complaints, nobles with either ridiculous things or legitimate concerns and some scientists wanting to prove how smart they were.
She moved somewhat, the crinkling of her bottom this time being audible only to her. She could get used to this, despite her short dress the diaper was mostly hidden.
The farmer mare in front of her was mostly whining about a border overlap of a meter or so which Luna was just going to dismiss as soon as she finished her story. Instead her attention went to her diaper. She moved somewhat, the crinkling of her bottom this time being audible only to her which made her giggle. Feeling naughty that they couldn’t see she was padded like a foal.
She could get used to this, despite her short dress the diaper would be hidden if she used it and the crinkling was a welcome distraction from the ponies wasting her time.
Suddenly Luna felt the front of her diaper growing warm as she started wetting herself. It was quite a nice feeling, warm and comforting. Knowing she was safely wrapped up in the diapers.
“Princess Luna?” The farmer asked with a tone of worry.
“Don’t mind me, continue” Luna said almost blissfully.
As the stream slowed the farmer finished her rant and Luna just dismissed her. The next few went pretty quickly and before she knew it Luna saw that it was already time.
She stood up, almost forgetting her diaper “That concludes today’s night court” The ponies all bowed at their princess of the night and exited.
When most were gone Luna sighed and walked back up to the nursery. Eager to tell mommy how well she did.

13233211222211121211213.content:
The Princess of the Night made her way through the castle hallways once more late at night, on her way to tell her mommy dearest of her accomplishment. Her behind crinkled and squished subtly, not so well hidden in the yellow dress now that she was walking. She didn’t pay much attention to her own wet state at the moment, too excited to see her mommy. She found the nursery quickly and went inside with a proclamation of her arrival.
“Mommy! I have returned!” She strode inside, and the beautiful presence of Solaria was there to greet her upon her entrance. She offered a gentle smile to her daughter before the two of them embraced lovingly, wings and hooves. Solaria’s bigger body and wider wingspan practically covered her smaller daughter, their colors contrasting a great deal as well. “You seem happy Luna. Did court go well this time?”
The Lady of the Night looked up at her mother and nodded. “It went splendid, mommy. A little dull however…”
Solaria’s gentle smile faltered slightly as she looked down at her daughter. “But you stayed despite that. You should have done that earlier as well. The nobles and peasants alike won’t forget that you left court in a fit, unless you keep a clean record of meeting up and seeing each court session to the end.”
“But mommy-”
“That doesn’t mean you have to keep your padding clean, sweetie. However you willl stay at court, even if you have to fill your diapers to the brim, stink up the whole room and sit in your own filth for hours. Then you can come to me for a change.”
“But you changed me ear-”
“I was being lenient with you. Next time you leave court like you did earlier, I will send you back with a stinging backside and a full diaper.” She put her hoof under her daughter’s chin and made her look into her eyes. “Understood, Luna?”
Luna gulped, before smiling and nodding her head a little. Her mother smiled in return and leaned down, pressing her horn against her’s.
“Mommy.”
“Yes, sweetie?”
“I’m sleepy. Really sleepy.”
“Let’s get you changed sweetie. It’s about your bedtime anyway.”

1412.content:
It was another day in Ponyville at Twilight's library. Lately there was a lot of work for the arrival of Twilight's parents...

"Spike! We have to clean FASTER!" called Twilight.

"Can't we take a rest?" groaned Spike.

"But we haven't seen my parents since we left Canterlot!"

"Maybe so, but we have cleaned for hours! The entire library is spotless!"

"What has been wrong with you lately? You don't act like this very often."

"I am DONE!" declared Spike.

"Fine! But you will be paying!" hissed Twilight.

"Yeah, right." said Spike.
He walked on over to a couch and sat down.
A knocking came on the door.

"They're here!"
Twilight ran over to the door and opened it up.
"Twilight! My dear daughter!" said her father, Sparkle Starlight. Next to him was Twilight's mother, Twilight Twinkle.

"Where is Spike?" asked her mother.

"He got tired of cleaning and decided to hang up from working." Twilight shot a irritated glare at Spike.

"How about we head to Pinkie's new cupcake shack?" asked Twilight.

"Who is Pinkie?" asked both parents at once.

"Just a friend of mine and the best er- party planner in the world." replied Twilight.

"How about we go now?" asked her father.

"Alright. Spike, see you in the morning!"

"Bye..." and he headed up to his room.

His head was spinning. Was this the payback for not working?
Twilight walked in smiling deviously. He froze in terror.

Spike turned a brighter shade of pale. He suddenly got warmer and realized he wet himself.

Spike resisted his own hunger, but eventually he gave in. He chomped it down hungrily.

What will she say?

Celestia... I need you to pay a visit fast.

Spike woke up finding himself in a stroller sucking on a pacifier.
The Elements of Harmony were taking him through Ponyville on a walk.
The ponies are just waking up... prepare yourself. This is gonna be a long day...
Don't worry. I'll wake them up faster.
Crap. I am doomed.
Twilight's horn exploded with the sound of a huge trumpet, waking all the citizens of Ponyville.
Everyone came out at once, gathered up around Twilight, and then she took off the stroller cover.
Silence. Then,
HAHAHAHA!
The laughter would not stop. Undying laughter.
Spike wanted to die. Crawl in a hole, fill it with lava and die. He would rather be a servant of Discord. Anything. ANYTHING other than this.
Suddenly Celestia appeared. All ponies did the respective bow. Then she turned to Spike.
"Spike, I recall feeling one of thou dreams to never work again." said Celestia.
Spike nodded. "Yes. I never wanted to work again."
"You are not working, Spike. Thou does not need to work. You can let the Elements protect thou. You can let them help you. You will not have to get food for yourself. Now, you shall forever be like this. Farewell."
And she vanished. Spike was frozen after those words. He couldn't utter a word.
Why has my fate come to this?
He fell asleep from terror.

1413.content:
"Nopony's home yet..." Spike mumbled under his breath, slight panic and shivers raced down his spine thinking of the worst possible thing that could happen to him. He walked down the streets of a unusually quiet Ponyville carrying part of a giant saddlebag with him, edited by Rarity so that it would be fitted for someone as small as Spike. He looked from left to right with an uncertain frown of displeasure as he constantly checked the streets to make sure that no single pony even saw him with what he had in his saddle, not even Rarity or Twilight.

         He had the free few seconds to look inside of his saddlebag to check the contents he had bought with Twilight's own hard-worked bits, feeling ultimately terrible that he had stolen bits in the first place and bought the last thing that Twilight would expect stolen bits to go into. He moved the top-lid of his saddlebag and looked inside to see what he had bought from the Medical store, a large pack of "Silly Filly Diapers" a plastic container holding just about sixteen diapers made for ponies that were over the age of five. And luckily, Spike was just about around that age to fit into garments he had once dreamed of.

         He closed the lip of his saddlebag and looked around to find that he walked up to the front of the Ponyville library, he had a plan, an agenda to make sure that he wasn't caught, he took note of all of Twilight's schedules and meetings around and make use of the time so that he could buy his fresh pack of diapers.

         Spike gulped for a moment and slowly pushed the front door of the library, hearing the creaking coming out from the door made his stomach feel cramped within, he firstly poked his head into the library to try and get a good look of everything. All the light were turned off, this was part of Spikes plan. If he knew that someone was home, the lights would obviously turned on, but they weren't which was perfect for the little dragon.

         Without thinking, the little green dragon rushed into the library with the front door closed behind him, he made a quick jolt up the stairs and into Twilight's bedroom. The only source of lighting that wasn't turned off by the young dragon since it is where he would stash his newly bought diapers, he rushed over to one of the wardrobes that Twilight had in the corner of her bedroom and he opened it. And with no surprise at all, there was no clothes stored into the wardrobe because Twilight.

         "Right..." The young dragon mumbled, he opened the lid of the saddlebag once again and pulled out the packet of diapers and flashed them in his own face. The logo "Silly Filly Diapers" were bolded in bright pink and blue text, some of the words were blue, which stood for the little colts and some of the words were pink, for the little fillies. There was an image over the package showing a mare looking after a colt as if he was about to cry, the little colt on the image was wearing one of the diapers and looked like he was having some trouble walking.

         His heart felt like a black hole, it just felt like it was going to implode on himself, his urges, mind and even dreams told him to rip open the packet of diapers and wear them. Complete his fantasies and dreams, he would feel so happy for himself.

         "I g-guess one wouldn't h-hurt..." Spike gulped, beads of sweat began to make their way down and through his scales, feeling the ever-so disastrous feeling that someone would catch him trying a diaper on would be just around the corner.

         Before making his choice, he stashes the pack of diapers in the wardrobe and moves around a few of the boxes inside of it to hide the diapers from Twilight or anyone else that would go snooping around in wardrobes.
1413.title: He likes them

choices: Twilight, staring right at him. - He's been caught!
14132.content:
Spike looked from left to right to check if Twilight had returned, he kept himself still and tried his best not to breathe out loud so that he could hear the quiet clopping sound of Twilight's hooves as she came in through the front door. He leaned forward and reached out for the pack of diapers, he extended one of his claws out and flawlessly ripped open the packaging without damaging the diapers and pulled one of the undergarments out.

         Feeling the soft plastic-y smell of the diaper made his heart and stomach tinge with confusion, happiness, fear and even joy, he stood up and with his spare hand, he closed the wardrobe. Forever hiding the rest of the diapers until they were needed again, Spike had been waiting for this moment for a long time, he had always wanted to wear diapers even since he was such a little dragon, even littler than he was now. But it wasn't his choice that Twilight and Princess Celestia wanted him to be toilet trained as quickly as possible for the future lessons and assistant-hood, but now it was time to indulge himself and begin to work on what he always wanted: his lost childhood.

         The dragon messed around with the diaper until he opened it all the way up, he let the undergarment fall open as he walked over to Twilight's bed and climbed up to the top of it, he placed the diaper down on the bedsheets and then proceeded to lie down on top of it. He felt his scales rub against the soft absorbent material that was on the inside of the diaper, he was in bliss, he had never felt something so soft and comfortable before in his entire life.

         As he went through this simple process, he couldn't help but blush. There was a part of him that told him wearing diapers was bad, that he was a big-dragon and he didn't need them, but there was another side to him that wanted to wear them. He couldn't help himself but lean up and grab the front of the diaper and pull it over him, now with the front and back of the diaper in place, all he had to do is tape himself together and the diaper would be complete.

         The reached over to the left side of the diaper tape and grabbed them, he streteched them over to the front of the diaper and they perferctly managed to stick to the front of the diaper itself. Spike smiled amiss under all of this quick-fire stress and mix of emotion, he then did the same with the other side of tapes and found himself completely diapered.

         He stood up for a moment to embrace himself as he felt the diaper hug his scaly back-side, feeling like the true infant he never was. He tried to walk over to the edge of the bed, but it seemed that the diapers that Spike had bought were much thicker than he originally realised. The dragon began to waddle like a true infant struggling to walk as he jumped down from Twilight's bed and walked over to the mirror, his stomach felt like he was going to throw up. Something inside of him didn't like being in diapers, but the other side was in pure bliss.

         He stood infront of Twilight's mirror to get a good look at himself, he saw a young baby dragon wearing an incredibly thick diaper. He couldn't help but childishly giggle at this situation, he raised his claw up into the air and shoved it in his mouth just like a pacifier.

As he turned around he saw...
14132.title: Spike puts a diaper on

141322.content:
Spike turned around with his claw in his mouth, never feeling anymore proud than he ever did in her entire life. He was wearing a diaper, his dream had come true, he wanted to try out so many things, drinking from bottles, playing with toys, sleeping in a comfy bed like a crib and even being cared for by a pony that would baby him no matter what.

         But all of this imminent pride was to change as he walked a few paces with his eyes down to the ground looking at his perfect diaper when he bumped into something, he fell back onto his bottom and rubbed his eyes with his drool covered claw. He looked up to see Twilight standing right in front of him, she had seen it all. The purple unicorn stood there was her mouth agape and her pupils the size of peas.

         "S-Spike? What are you doing?" Twilight was the first one to speak, she trotted over to the dragon feeling unbelievably uncomfortable with what the dragon was wearing around his lower area. Spike looked up, it all immediately sinked in. He was such a stupid dragon, he had to try a diaper on just when Twilight just got home.

         "I... er..." Spike began to panic, his blush disappeared and now tears were starting to fall from his face. The little dragon quickly got up on his feet and quickly started to run from the unicorn, but alas, it was no use. Twilight used her magical horn to teleport the dragon on her bed, Spike knew that he wasn't going to get out of this mess and so he just began to bawl out like an infant.

         Twilight walked over to the sobbing dragon and climbed up on her bed and wrapped her hooves around him, embracing the baby dragon into a nice big hug.

         "Spike, it's okay... just tell me what's wrong?" Twilight whispered to the dragon, trying her best not to raise her voice. The purple mare was calm, she wasn't angry, neither scared at what Spike was doing.

         "I c-can't t-tell you!" Spike whimpered, he had wrapped himself up like a ball-like state, but he couldn't wrap himself properly due to the diaper he was wearing.

         "Why not?" Twilight softly asked.

         "It's s-stupid!" Spike bawled out to the unicorn.

         "I'm your best friend Spike, you can tell me."
141322.title: Spike has been caught!

14132211.content:
The baby dragon leaned up and faced towards Twilight, he had noticed that the purple unicorn had placed her hoof on his back-side and began to slowly rub his scales back and forth in an attempt to calm him down. He wiped his tears that dripped from his face and gave Twilight a big hug and then let go.

         "I sorta'... wanted to... uh, wear these diapers..." Spike sniffled, the little dragon kept his eye-sight away from Twilight.

         "Why? I'm not angry, and trust me, I'm not going to make fun of you." Twilight reassured the dragon.

         "I felt like you and the Princess were rushin' me too hard... I'm still a baby dragon... I wanna have my baby years like they are supposed to be done..." Spike tried to explain, a great gaping void in his mind approached as he didn't know what else to say, he waited a moment for Twilight to speak.

         "I see... continue..." Twilight's face of confusion began to slowly drift into a saddened motive, she understood what the dragon was trying to get across.

         "I'd sometimes have these funny dreams where some pony would look after me like a baby, I'd be wearin' diapers and I'd have to be carried everywhere and stuff like that..." Spike began to explain. "I'd got a little crazy and I kept on dreaming about the diapers... so I stole some of your bits and bought some, if you didn't show up so early I would've just crawled around in the diaper for a little while..."

         "Spike." Twilight rose up on her bed, instantly towering over the dragon. Spike felt like running away this instant, he didn't know what she was going to do.

         "Y-yeah..." Spike replied.

         "You don't need to be afraid, if you want to act like a little baby dragon then that's fine." Twilight nuzzled the dragon.

         "R-really?!" Spike's mind exploded, the padded dragon jumped on the bed in joy. "YEAH!"

         "But..." Twilight began to speak again. "If you are going to act like a little baby, then someone needs to look after you."

         "Wh-what?!" Spike gulped.

         "Babies need mommies to depend on them Spike, so if you are going to be a baby, then you need some pony to look after you." Twilight replied back.

         "But who?" Spike asked.

         "Fluttershy is good with foals, she even has baby supplies." Twilight said.

         "Um, who else?" Spike wanted to know another option.

         "Well... there is me..."

1413221112.content:
"Fluttershy, I can't thank you enough for looking after Spike while I went to get his baby supplies." Twilight smiled at the yellow pegasus as she walked besides her into the kitchen.

         "It's no problem Twilight, I'll always have spare time to look after babies, especially Spike." Fluttershy began to blush and leaned her head over to Twilight's ear. "Especially since Spike is so cute in a diaper." she whispered.

         "Anyways, how was Spike while I went out?" Twilight giggled after hearing Fluttershy's whisper, she then turned her head to look at Spike who was currently busy with the task of shoving his claw into his mouth like a pacifier.

         "Oh, he was an angel. Spike was now elevated into his new position, he couldn't believe the outstanding view he had of the library kitchen. The high chair that Twilight and Fluttershy had strapped him into was perfect, there was a cushion on the seat of the chair itself, allowing a comfy sit while he waited for his baby food. He watched as Twilight walked over to the kitchen table and opened up her saddlebags with her magic and pulled out the items she had bought just for Spike, a set of pacifiers flew out of one saddlebag and landed on the table, two milk bottles designed for actual foals were magically pulled out and finally some clothing that Spike had never seen before.

         Twilight turned her head and faced the baby dragon with a smile on her face.

         "How's my little Spikey-Wikey doing?" Twilight trotted over to Spike in the high-chair and nuzzled him affectionately, the little dragon just giggled and reached out for Twilight's mane.

         "I'm doing fine!" Spike tried his best to create a childish tone of voice, even more so, an infantile one.

         "Do you want your bottle of milk now? Or do you want it when me and Fluttershy have finished making your food?" Twilight giggled as Spike reached out for her mane, even starting to laugh when she heard the childish tone of voice. Spike stopped his actions for a moment and thought about his quick decision, he then tapped his chin and came out with the final answer.

         "Can I have my bottle later?" Spike giggled to himself, noting how silly he just completely sounds to himself.

         "Sure thing, now in the meantime I am going to give you a pacifier, that should stop you from sucking on your claw." Twilight trotted back over to the kitchen table and used her magic to pull out one of the pacifiers from their plastic boxing and floated it over towards Spike, the dragon grabbed onto the pacifier as it floated towards him and he shoved it in his mouth and started to suck on it as he waited for his food.

         As the pacifier was in his mouth he made loud suckling noises as he began to use it properly, both Fluttershy and Twilight stopped what they were doing and looked at Spike for a quick second to see where the source of the noise was coming from.

         "Is my Spikey Wikey enjoying his pacifier?" Twilight cooed across the room.

         Spike nodded his head up and down in sheer delight.

         "Gee, Spike sure loves to be treated like a little baby so much." Fluttershy moved closer to her friend and began to privately speak with her.

         "I still kinda have my doubts about this whole baby thing, but earlier today, he went that far and stole some bits just to buy some diapers, I don't think myself that this would be a prank or anything." Twilight replied back to her winged friend.

         "He told me that he was told to be grown-up all the time when you were both still in Canterlot... I guess that he didn't have enough years to be a baby to himself?" Fluttershy pondered on what the dragon had said to her before.

         "Well..." Twilight paused for a moment. "From the first few weeks after he was hatched out of his egg, I remember Princess Celestia trying to teach him how to walk, talk and all the other stuff a grown dragon would know... Maybe he just feels over-worked and that having responsibilities are having a bad effect for a dragon as young as him." Twilight theorized.

         "It's a shame for poor little Spike..." Fluttershy lowered her head in slight-shame for the dragon.

"Now Spike, I have a special surprise for you, are you ready to see what it is?" Twilight stood at the top of the library stair-case and turned her head to the infantile dragon, a big smile rose upon Spikes face and he nodded up and down. Unable to hide his excitement for what his surprise could be, could it be a new toy?, a playmate?, he just couldn't guess of what it could be.

         "Yeah! I wanna see my supwise!" Spike childishly chattered away to his mommy.

         "Alright." Twilight gleamed with excitement. "Here we go!" Twilight slowly made her way downstairs into the main living room, Spike frantically looked around the library living room and saw something that quickly popped the excitement for him. He saw Princess Celestia standing in the living room waiting for Twilight and Spike to come downstairs, the dragon grabbed Twilight's mane and shuffled himself into her purple mane hairs to try and hide himself from the princess. Yet it was no use, Twilight shook her head which stopped the baby dragon from hiding away from the princess of the sun.

         "Aww, he is so cute!" The Princess squealed in absolute joy, she slowly trotted over to Twilight and craned her head down to get closer to the baby dragon as he tried to cower himself away from the large white alicorn.

         Spike didn't say anything, his time of wanting to be a baby again had ceased, the princess knew, and it was one of the least few ponies that Spike wished that they knew about his deep-dark secret. He looked away from the princess and closed his eyes with his claws, just like an actual infant, he was shy without knowing he was.

         "Spike, it's me. Celestia ... aww, is the baby shy? Does he need a great big hug?" Celestia giggled as she tried to coax out the infantile dragon, but it was no use. Spike didn't budge a single bit.

         "Spike? Celestia is talking to you." Twilight delightfully teased the dragon.

         Spike slowly turned his head, Twilight and Celestia watched as the dragon turned the face them, not with a smile, but with tears rolling down his face.

         "What's wrong Spike? Does your diaper need changing?" Celestia nuzzled the dragon in affection.
1413221112111211112.title: Princess Celestia waits for him!

14132211121112111121.content:
"I wanted to tell you how I felt about you treating me like a grown-up..." Spike began, but he was soon interrupted.
"It's okay Spike. I now realize that I forced to much onto you at too young of an age. Fortunately for you, you may get your chance to relive your infancy." Celestia stated.
Spike and Twilight were both confused at this statement. "What do you mean Princess?" Twilight asked.

"Spike's form is extremely malleable Twilight." Celestia began to explain. "I'm sure you've noticed his actions becoming foal-like already. Dragon's naturally appear how they see themselves. Normally this results in them losing themselves in their greed. However, Spike is a bit of an unusual case due to how he was hatched. Spike will metally and physically adjust himself to match how he seems himself. It's also probably why he's stayed the same size he is now despite his current age."

Spike sat down and contemplated Celestia's words. "So does this mean if I start to see my self as a foal I will become one for real?" Celestia nodded. The baby dragon was stunned. He could have a real foal hood! But what a what about Rarity and my other friends? Would they understand? And would Twilight still take care off me?

"Spike," said dragon looked towards Twilight as she spoke gently, "If this is what you really want, I'll support you. Our friends will understand if being a foal makes you happy. Whether you want to be a dragon or if you want to be a foal, I'm here for you." Spike could tell from Twilight's loving gaze that she truly would accept him regardless of his decision.

Spike thought over his time acting like Twilight's foal since she discovered his secret. Do I want that all the time? Spike knew that his life would change depending on his next choice. Right now I'm just a baby dragon. Do I want to be a Baby though? Or do I want do be a Dragon.
14132211121112111121.title: A Baby or a Dragon

Spike liked this past day of being a Baby far more then the past 16 years of being a baby dragon. He looked up at Twilight and made his decision. While he could just say what he wanted, Spike knew he was a baby now. He also knew he had to mess. I can't wait until I'm really a baby Spike thought as he pushed into his diaper. He felt himself wet at the same time.

Celestia and Twilight smiled. "Looks like someone wants to be foal." Twilight said to her new baby. Spike, remembering old picture of him, pull his tail into his mouth like a pacifier.

Celestia looked over the two. "Please note I have no idea how fast he will regress nor how it will begin to take effect. I do hope you are happy with your new life Spike." Spike merely smiled around his tail This is actually pretty fun, I don't know why I ever stopped Spike thought. With that smile, Celestia knew it was time to let the new mother and foal pair enjoy each others company.

Spike regression progressed quite smoothly after that. Within a day he was speaking like a toddler, and either he stopped trying to read or he just couldn't. His potty training may have well disappeared the moment he decided he was a baby for all the good it did. By the end of the week, he had even shunken a bit to a real foal's size.

Spike was truly a Baby once again.

Later that night...

The lights in the library were dimmed, the curtains and windows were closed and so was the front door. Twilight and Princess Celestia sat down on the living room chairs conversing to each other, in the corner of the living room was Spike. Trapped in a large play-pem which was especially bought for him by Twilight, he sat in a fresh-new diaper now playing with toys that he only had once dreamed of, a pacifier was in his mouth and all he thought of how life couldn't get any better.

"I'm really happy that Spike was able to tell me about his little secret, the best thing for him now is to have his dreams made best for him. I honestly felt worked up on the inside when he said about me raising him up too fast, I do think that was honestly true." Princess Celestia happily conversed between Twilight as she took a sip of warm tea.

"It was just kind of a surprise to hear him steal some of my bits and go that far to buy some diapers himself, I found him trying them on in my room... yet, it does feel weird now that I'm treating Spike like a baby, I do feel happy that he chose me to be his mommy. I can learn from this experience for when I have an actual foal for myself." Twilight smiled and talked to the Princess on the subject matter.

"Heh." Celestia lightly chuckled. "Auntie Celestia, that does ring a nice bell." Celestia said.

"I'm sure Cadance will be happy to hear that she can baby-sit Spike again, that's if, she still does baby-sitting." Twilight chuckled at what Celestia had said.

"Mama! Mama!" Spike called out in-between Twilight and Celestia's conversation, both mares turned their heads to see Spike standing up whilst trying to climb out of the play-pen.

141322111211121111221111.content:
Twilight laid the baby dragon down on the changing table, smiling cheerfully and humming to herself as she strapped him in. "We can't have our little baby rolling off, now can we?" She said with a giggle as she got ready to change his diaper. Carefully unfastening the tapes around his waist, she unfolded the diaper and rolled it up. "Such a messy, messy dragon!" She disposed of the soiled garment. "Man," Spike thought to himself, "she's really getting into this..."

Twilight continued with the task, spreading some foal powder around on his bottom before reaching down and getting a fresh diaper. "Okay, lift those legs up, Spikey!" She said as she lifted his bottom from the table, sliding the diaper underneath him. With a soft smile, she finished her task and pulled the diaper between his legs, fastening the tapes nice and snug around his hips. "There we go! All done!" She said, giggling. Before Spike could react, Twilight leaned down and gave him some raspberries on his tummy! "A-pfffffffft!"

Spike tried to resist, but it was no use. He began laughing and wiggling on the changing table until Twilight stopped and unstrapped him, lifting him up into her hooves. "Now let's get you fed, my little baby boy." She carried him downstairs where she had a baby bottle of milk waiting for him. Cradling him in her front legs as she sat down on her couch, she took the pacifier out of Spike's mouth and started to feed the milk to him. "Drink it up, honey..." She whispered warmly.

Spike, a little caught off guard, began to suckle down the contents of the bottle, relaxing in Twilight's legs. He still couldn't believe she was really going this far with it, but he could care less. He was having the time of his life and he didn't want it to stop. After hungrily drinking up the milk and emptying the bottle, Spike smiled up at her. "All done, baby?" She said as she put the bottle down and lifted him over her shoulder, patting his back with her hoof. "Come on, sweetie, burp for mommy..."

Spike moaned a little bit before letting out a short burp. "Oh come on, baby, you've gotta have more gas than that..." She continues patting away, causing Spike to let out a larger, but still fairly short belch. "Good boy! That's mommy's good baby boy, getting those yucky bubbles out for mommy..." Twilight said lovingly. "Now, I think we should go outside for a walk today. What do you think, baby?"

"Well, I--" Spike began, before being interrupted by a pacifier being plopped into his mouth. "Hush, honey...remember, you can't talk, you're just a baby." She smiled. Spike was silent before giving her a childish nod. "Alright!" She said, carrying him over to a baby pram and lying him down in it, tucking him in under a blanket. "Ready, baby?" She asked, not expecting an answer as she pushed the pram outside, taking her baby out for a walk.

144331121.content:
Okay. Mental regression it is!

As the Doctor, as ponies call him, walks down the town in a daydream of thoughts, he failed to notice the sky getting dark and rain beginning to fall. What a perfect mood for such a day. His thoughts were broken as he sneezed after unknowingly walking into the Everfree Forest.

"Damn." He muttered, turning around. His heart (well, one of them if ya know what I mean) sank as he realised he'd walked too far to get back to Ponyville any time soon. He knew of a zebra called Zecora around these parts, well who didn't, and decided he would ask for shelter. His sneezes got worse as the rain thudded down. His legs grew numb and he fell onto the mud with an almost pained cry. Dark coloured mud smothered his stomach, hooves, neck and chin as he struggled to get up. Giving up with a cry of pain, he collapsed again into the mud, the brown substance stinging his eyes as it splashed in his face.

"Who is this I see, lying in the mud in front of me?" Comes a familiar voice, one the Doctor Whooves was glad to hear. Craning his neck to look up, he was happy to see Zecora standing over him. He groaned weakly but happily before trying to stand slowly. But he was forced down to the ground by weakness, and Zecora frowned. She said nothing, deciding to help him stand and leant him against her as she supported him. Within minutes, they were back at the cottage of the zebra, and she lay Doctor Whooves on a bed.

"A delicious food I shall make, for that illness has your life at stake."

Doctor Whooves could do nothing but whimper in response as he watched her. When she was finished, she fed him the food, which, true to her word, was delicious.

"Doctor now you must rest, for that is how it works best."

Doctor Whooves then...

1443322212212.content:
Maud wasn't too keen on visiting Pinkie...with her friends tagging along again. Sure, they were on...decent terms, but Maud hadn't wanted the relationship to escalate into anything more. Pinkie insisted on it though.

...She always insisted on doing stuff to get Maud more out-going. While those feelings did come from a place of love, they sometimes went too far.

Maybe 'sometimes' didn't cut it; 'always' fits in more snuggly.

But, family is family. No matter how wacky.

Taking a deep breath, Maud hesitantly walked off the train, and immediately got surprised by a party having been set up. On. The. Train. Station!

I-is that even legal?!

...Apparently so, seeing as nopony yelled at or threw hoovecuffs on the party attendants.

Without notice, Pinkie shoved a plate of cake an inch from her sister's face, smiling as broadly as possible.

Maud stated with her usual emotionless tone, "Pinkie Pie. I don't want cake, okay?"

Pinkie shrugged, then dug into the cake shamelessly, launching icing everywhere.

Everypony else used manners when greeting the rock-studier, which she appreciated in her thoughts.

Maud let a small smile release when Pinkie's friends approached, only for Pinkie's sake.

Rainbow spoke first, boasting how much farther she could throw rocks now before actually saying anything worth caring about, "So, I'm pretty sure I can beat ya! Rocks end up halfway across the world when I'm done with 'em! Safe bet to say I'll win any future matches we have, Maud! Hopefully, we can have a nice competition a little while after you get moved into Twi's library!"

Maud was taken aback, which only meant a literal step back, by this sudden knowledge, "I thought I was to stay with Pinkie."

Pinkie clarified quickly, "Oh, well...my home's kinda...sorta...perhaappss...been in need of repair after I cooked too much rock candy. Heh-heh...oopsie."

Maud needed more info than that, "What? I...saw you cook rock candy to the ceiling last time. How is this worse than the previous time?"

Pinkie explained on the way to Twilight's home, where Pinkie also stayed at the moment, that the rock candy from her newest recipe clumped together, creating a blockade of sugary goodness throughout the house incapable of being broken excepted by pickaxe. The firefighters were taking their sweet time in helping free the party pony's house of candy.

So, both Pie sisters were allowed residence in Twilight's library.

Once unpacked, Maud sat down with Pinkie to hear about all the amazing events that happened since last Maud visited Ponyville. Twilight decided to let them have some bonding time, so went to the basement to work again on a bucking hard spell that had been a thorn in her side for days.

After an hour though, Pinkie was out of stories, so tried to find a new activity for them. Pinkie hadn't come up with a fun idea until listening to Twilight's scream of outrage.

Next second, Maud was being led down the stairs with Pinkie saying, "Come on, sis'! Let's see what a certain magical somepony's been up to!"

...Maud wasn't too sure this would end well.

That night, Macintosh was laying in bed thinking about his foal days. He missed them and wish he could remember more. "I just wish I could be young again," Big Mac whispered gazing up at the ceiling. Big Mac closed his eyes and fell asleep.

Big Macintosh rolled out of his bed and noticed...
