1451112.content:
Big Macintosh looked around wildly as Apple Jack walked in, "I overheard you talkin' to yerself Mackie."

He looked at AJ confused. Apple Jack sighed, "Last night. Remember now?" Big Macintosh nodded. AJ continued, "Now I've decided ta help ya with yer request. I'm sendin' Applebloom an' Granny on a trip ta Appleloosa fer the rest a(of) the summer break (2.5 months). I'll take care a(of) the farm with the help a(of) my friends. Don't worry, they won't be findin' out yer stayin' here. Fer now, ya'll be calling me Mama or Mommy. You will be a good little boy an' follow all the rules an' instructions I give ya. This will start tomorrow mornin' once they have left. Ya can stay in here an' adjust to yer new nursery. I may add rules if I feel the need ta. Does mah wittle Mackie understand all this?" Big Macintosh nodded quickly.

Apple Jack walked out and shut the door behind her. Big Mac locked the door so Applebloom and Granny Smith couldn't come in. Macintosh was nervous but still a part of him was excited.
1451112.title: The room looked like a nursery (adult foal)

choices: Big Mac gets into his new foal things by himself.
Big Mac waits for his sister to return.
14511121.content:
Big Macintosh let out a sigh once he had locked himself in his room. Looking around in curiosity, he began to survey the entirety of his new bedroom. Big Mac walked around his room looking at every new piece of furniture. His room had been filled with everything a foal might need. A new dresser replaced to old one that he previously had. The new one was much lower and appeared to also be a changing station; the change mat and pail beside the dresser were evidence of that. Big Mac continued to looks around as he noticed his new sleeping arrangements in the corner of his room. A crib fit for a foal but big enough for a full grown stallion was ready to replace his bed. The curtains that hung from his window where now of a more foalish variety along with the wallpaper that now adorned his walls.

Big Macintosh silently wondered to himself how his sister could have done all of this while he slept, and why she would even want to do this. The crimson stallion lets out another sigh as he plopped his hindquarters onto the floor in the middle of the room. He blushed to himself as he came to grips with his situation. "One of the few times I open mah mouth and this happens..." Big Mac says to himself as his thoughts find there way out of his mouth. He thinks about his current situation for a few moments and his muzzle breaks into a grin as he begins to imagine what it would be like to be a foal again. Catching himself daydreaming about being a foal, Big Macintosh's face turns a deeper shade of red as his blush is renewed.

Feeling very silly and embarrassed about the situation, Big Macintosh tries to be optimistic as thinks to himself "Maybe this wont so bad after all."
14511121.title: Follow this story line

145111212.content: Big Mac decided to wait for Applejack to return, following orders. He paced around his nursery looking at everything in detail. His crib was a navy blue with crimson red highlights. His old mobile, refurbished and polished, swung softly above. A blanket with golden apples, a larger version of his blanket when he was younger, lay folded and ready to use. He found a pacifier and placed it in his mouth, before realizing he needed to pee. Grinning to himself, he let go and blushed lightly as his diaper grew warm and tinted yellow. Plopping down on his padded rear, he heard the door begin to creak open and turned to see....
145111212.title: Big Mac waits for his sister to return.

choices: Keep him in his current diaper, and don't let him waste it.
1451112122.content:
Applejack smiled lovingly at her brother. She was so glad that he had taken a quick liking to the idea of being a foal again. "Awww... Aren't ya just the cutest little colt I ever saw." Applejack said as she fawned over her older sibling. Big Mac had turn around to look back at his sister standing in the door way. He continued to blush, feeling a bit embarrassed as his sister cooed him. His bladder continued to empty itself in front of the mare as he briefly forgot why he was blushing in the first place.

"Poor lil' Macintosh. You just need a break from all yer day to day big pony chores huh?" Applejack said as she walking into the bedroom and nuzzled Big Mac's blushy cheeks. "You were so excited about being a foal again, you went and got started all by yerself." The Mare says, leaning over her brothers shoulders and poking at his soaked padding. "I can tell yer gonna be a good colt for your big sis'. Isn't that right Lil' Mac?" Applejack said in a demanding tone. Big Macintosh nodded quickly at the question his sister posed; partly, he nodded out of want and partly out of fear of who she might tell. "Now what should we do with this eager lil' colt." Applejack thought allowed, making Big Mac whine in worry.
1451112122.title: Applejack

14511121221.content:
His now older sister chuckled when she heard him whine. "Ya sound a lil' worried there, Lil' Mackie. Are ya? Do ya wanna a diapey change?" He turned his head away, blushing, his face lighter than the shade of red on his coat. Applejack frowned slightly, and put a hoof on his soaked padding, squishing it slightly. "Look at yer Mama when she ask ya a question." He instantly turned his head back to look at her, cringing from her squishing. She stopped the squishing asked him again. "Does Lil' Mackie want a diapey change?" He looked down, trying to think, but Applejack began to squish his diaper again. "Ya want a spankin'? Look at me."

He was humiliated now, the thought of being spanked by his younger sister, even if she was acting as his mommy, making him even more so. He looked back at her and nodded, frowning. Applejack stepped back, moving her hoof away from his diaper. "Say what ya want, Lil' Mackie!" She giggled now, loving the teasing. He was defiantly skeptical of being babied, even if it was his own wish, but in time she would get him to mentally regress to a foal, even if only slightly.

His face got even redder, and he opened his mouth to speak, but stopped, shaking his head. "Ah don't wanna a change, Applejack..." She came closer to him, putting her hoof near his diaper again. "Ya have to call me Mama fer as long as yer a foal. Call me that, and say what ya want." He looked about ready to cry, no longer looking like the strong stallion he once was. "Ah don't wanna a change, Mama..." Applejack nodded, and stood back again. "Lil' Mackie is smart. Now when ya make a stinky later, ya won't be using a fresh diaper, and we'll have an extra one to spare!"

Big Mac looked down again, sighing. He tried his best to ignore her, but the thought of messing a diaper still bothered him. He looked back up at her when he heard her move. She picked up his pacifier in put it in his mouth, himself having let it fall out of his mouth when she entered. He was about to spit it out, but Applejack held her hoof in front of his mouth. "Don't spit that out unless ah say ya can. Now, Mama is going to tell ya the rules, and ya only need to nod to say ya understand them. Now, nod so ah know ya heard everything ah just said."
14511121221.title: Change Lil' Mac's diaper

choices: He nods again, seeing no other choice.
145111212211.content:
Big Mac nodded, not wanting to anger her. She moved her hoof away from in front of his mouth, and he didn't spit the pacifier out for the same reason. She began to speak, and he listened, sucking on the pacifier without realizing it.

"Ya are to only speak when ya have some to tell me or are respondin' to a question ah ask. If ya plan on makin' a protest against an order ah give ya, don't bother sayin' it. Just say "Yes Mama, or nod." She finished talking and nodded at him. "Like that. Now, does Lil' Mackie understand? Ya better not talk back to me." He nodded in response, and Applejack smile at him. "Good."

She continued now. "Don't take off yer diapey or clothing ah put on ya. Ya can say if ya want somethin' off, though, obviously not yer diapey, but that don't mean ah have to. If ah give ya a toy, play with it unless there's another around. If a give ya a bottle, drink it." He was shocked that she had toys and bottles for him as well, but nodded.

"If ya don't listen to the rules ya will be punished. If ya do, ya may get rewards." He nodded again.

She smiled, and stated the last rule. "Ya will not ever leave this house when yer my foal. Ya may not go into any other room unless ah say ya can. This includes the bathroom. The only time ya can go in there is if ah give ya a bath." His eyes widened at the knowledge of being trapped in here unless given permission to leave, and also due to the last thing she mentioned. "That's right, Lil' Mac. Ya won't be usin' the potty for a really long time. You'll rely on yer diapers, and rely on me to change them. Now, does mah little foal understand?"
145111212211.title: He responds with a nod

1451112122111.content:
He nodded, but regretted this instantly. He quickly spit his pacifier out, and reached for the tapes on his diaper. Applejack was quicker, and quickly grabbed his hooves, holding them in place. "What do ya think yer doin'?" She asked in an angry and annoyed tone. "Lil' Mac isn't allowed to take his diapeys off. Is he trying to do that?"

Big Mac looked up at, speaking now. "Ah don't want to do this anymore, Applejack! Ah... Ah thought ya would just change mah diapers and all, but now yer just..." He was about to finish speaking, but Applejack quickly smacked him in the face. Though it wasn't too hard, it was enough to shock him. "Arguin', trying to take yer diapey off, and not callin' me mama... Ya deserve a spanking, young man!" She sat on the ground, and quickly pulled him into her lap, so his stomach was right on it. He was stronger than her, yes, but her grip on him stopped him from being able to push himself up. She held his forelegs down with one arm, and used the other to raise her free hoof in the air. He began to cry now, afraid of her. It happened too fast, and she was truly going to make his experience bad if he didn't act the correct way. Though he would be a foal, he would be an obedient one, and always listen to his mommy, but he didn't know that until now.

She brought her hoof down, quickly, giving him a powerful slap on his backside. He yelped, now completely in tears. He tried to plead with her, begging her to stop, but she ignored him, and continued spanking him. After about ten times, she stopped, and spoke. "Ah'm sorry ah had to do that, Lil' Mackie. Ah didn't want to, but ya need to learn. Ya really do. Now, tell mama yer sorry, and that you'll be good."

Still in tears, and afraid, he nodded. He knew he should trust his mommy now, and was now willing to do whatever she wanted him to do. He spoke, in between sobs. "Mama, ah'm sorry... Ah should have listened to ya. Ah'll be good, and leave mah diapey alone! Ah'll wet it and mess it and ask ya for changes!" He continued crying after this, but Applejack put a hoof in his mane, stroking it to calm him down. "Shhhh, there there... It's okay, Lil' Mackie... Ah still love ya, and ah'm glad ya promise ya'll be good."

She stuck his pacifier in his mouth, and continued to brush his mane. His mother's touch and the pacifier made him calm down, and he happily sucked on it. After awhile, Applejack spoke. "Does mah little foal want a bottle?"

"Goodness, Fluttershy, are you alright? Please come in," said Twilight.

But Fluttershy shook her head. "In a minute, she said, her voice slightly mumbled. Then, in a quiet tone she added, "I'm pooping."

Rarity came to the door, took one look at Fluttershy's face and knew exactly what she was doing. "Twilight!" she admonished, "please give Fluttershy her privacy when nature calls." She hooked a leg around Twilight and pulled her back inside. "I'm so sorry, Fluttershy. You do what you need to do."

Fluttershy blushed and nodded as Rarity closed the door again. She focused back on her bowel movement, her tail twitching somewhat as she pushed it into the seat of her diaper. She felt a little bit more relieved, and the came inside the palace-house.

"All done, darling?" asked Rarity. She could see the weight dragging Fluttershy's diaper down, and she hoped for the poor pegasus's sake that was all. Fluttershy nodded. "Would you like a change?"

Fluttershy shook her head. Not that Rarity was surprised. Usually Rainbow Dash was the only pony she would let change her, and she wasn't here yet. Fluttershy squatted down next to them, careful not to sit down and squish the mess. Rarity wrinkled her nose but tried to stay polite. Gilda sat up from laying on the ground passed out. She shook stars and feathers out of her eyes, yawned, and stretched her limbs to their limits before relaxing and getting up on four paws. She then noticed something amiss. Sitting down to think, she soon found what had happened. She looked down and saw, between her back legs, a diaper with baby items all around the waistband. While she blushed the shade of a ripe tomato, she also noticed that it was wet and messy and nearly screamed.

"Nononono!!!", she exclaimed in a hushed tone as she tried to take the diaper off her backside, and quite soon found out it was impossible due to the thick flannel mittens tied around her hands and wrists. "What the hell happened last night?"

forcing her mind away from the garment taped onto her she finally took in her surroundings. She was sleeping in a crib large enough to accomodate herself and another pony or griffon. The walls were a light shade of blue and pink with cute pictures painted everywhere. Along one wall there stood an enlarged changing table filled with diapers, wipes, and baby powder. There were two other cribs tucked neatly away in the corner, though these looked significantly smaller, like meant for an actual foal.

Then she noticed the door and windows. The windows looked normal with the exception of what looked like a few layers of reinforced chicken wire. The door had a key lock and a handle. She got up and tried to climb over the crib but the crib was too high for her to reach. Then she tried flying and instantly fell back onto her backside, reminding her of her figurative and literal mess. She looked and saw her wings bound by a silver clasp ran over her wings and made a tight circle around them and her chest. She kept trying for a while and finally gave up when...

info.brief_description: Your favorite characters from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic are padded by diapers!
info.description:
Welcome to My Little Pony: Diapers are Magic!

In this interactive story, you will choose which character from the show ends up in a diaper and gets into situations that they usually wouldn't get into. Choose which character you want and start off a story then pad those ponies up and see how the situation develops.


-RULES-


1. No sex, but character shipping of any kind is tolerable.
2. You must not kill off any characters.
3. No transformations are allowed, except for Mental Regression.
4. Any characters that become incontinent must have a reason and a cause for them to be that way, they must start off continent and then something happening to them to cause their incontinence.
5. Wetting and Messing is allowed.
6. Please add actual description into what you are writing, no one wants a chapter that only has a few words of description and then a interactive choice.

If there are rules that you are uncertain about or you do not understand one of them, please take the time to message me.

[X] - 400 Chapters.
[X] - 800 Chapters.
[X] - 1000 Chapters.
[X] - 1000+ Chapters.
info.pretty_title: My Little Pony: Diapers are Magic
